programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley present the words-and-numbers game, with Nicki Chapman alongside Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner.(n)

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug smashes into Kelly and Deacon's car, causing untold damage and a war of words on what should have been a pleasant evening out. Meanwhile, Kirby teases Spence when he discovers he has an allergy to nuts. Comedy, starring Kevin James and Leah Remini.(n)

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Carrie is invited to a company gathering, where Doug impresses the other lawyers' partners with tales of his fictitious mountaineering exploits. Back at home, Arthur wrecks their bedroom and enlists Deacon's help in repairing the damage before they return.(n)

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug decorates the house for Halloween against Arthur's wishes - and then regrets it when the old man has a heart attack. Meanwhile, Deacon wants to buy a comic-book character costume for his son, but is frustrated to find there aren't any black superheroes. Comedy, starring Kevin James.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Amy's parents draw attention to Robert's strange eating habits, making him feel self-conscious every time he sits down for a meal - so Debra devises a plan to cure him once and for all. Ray Romano, Patricia Heaton and Brad Garrett star.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: An invitation to spend Easter with the Barones spurs the MacDougalls to unite with the family over a 500-piece jigsaw puzzle - until Ray and Pat upset the apple cart by indulging in more than their fair share of bonding. Comedy, starring Ray Romano and Patricia Heaton.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Daphne offers to cook a romantic dinner to help Niles make amends with Maris after an argument - but ends up stranded with him on a stormy night. Comedy, starring David Hyde Pierce and Jane Leeves.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The shrink goes all out to win when he and Roz are nominated for a radio award, but wishes he hadn't after he discovers he is up against a veteran talk-show host who is retiring. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Former undercover bosses, including the co-owner of a frozen yoghurt company and the chief executive of a sports bar and grill, want to take another look at the everyday workings of their businesses, but fear they will be recognised. They each send an employee in their place to report on how their firms are functioning.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef travels to La Grange, a suburb of Chicago, to help the owners of Cafe 36, an upmarket bistro threatening to destroy the marriage of its owners due to the scale of their financial losses. The head chef's attitude to quality control is driving customers away, and it is up to Gordon Ramsay to turn the business around.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Includes news headlines, sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Vet on the Hill
programme.desc: Scott Miller treats a French bulldog that has a life-threatening condition. A shih-tzu faces a huge battle and a beagle is having problems.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawn
programme.desc: Prestige Pawnbrokers boss James Constantinou mixes business with pleasure as he heads to Spain to meet an entrepreneur friend who's looking to get a £100,000 loan on his luxury 18-metre yacht. A young widow finds it difficult to part with her late husband's vintage car to set up a new life in Croatia, jewellery expert Monika is shocked when she's asked to deal with a golden rat, and the shop staff struggle to put a price on some rare and problematic black coral statues.(n)

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley present the words-and-numbers game, with Nicki Chapman joining Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner.(n)

programme.title: Fifteen to One
programme.desc: Sandi Toksvig hosts the general knowledge quiz in which 15 contestants try to win a place in the final, when a £40,000 jackpot will be up for grabs.(n)

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: South African couple Gary and Dawn are seeking a permanent home in Spain, with plenty of outdoor space for a barbecue, while art consultant Amy wants a holiday home in Almeria.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Things do not run smoothly for three Bournemouth couples, as one pair are late with their cooking, talk of butchering causes upset and a pescatarian is accidentally served meat.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer takes Ned Flanders to Las Vegas, where they go on a drunken binge at a casino and wake up with hangovers to find themselves married to sleazy, gold-digging cocktail waitresses. Featuring the guest voices of the Moody Blues.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Kim is trying to keep Grace away from Esther, but Grace is beginning to worry. Elsewhere, Darren's money troubles get worse when his car breaks down, and he panics when Nancy suggests that they should go quad biking for the day as one of their bucket list activities.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Great British Buildings: Restoration of the Year
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud and Anna Keay present buildings in the Early category - those constructed between the 13th and 16th centuries. Those in the running are Hampton Court Palace, the Royal Hospital in Chelsea, a medieval building in Ledbury, and Hardwick Hall in Derbyshire, where the previously derelict stable block and barns have been revitalised for modern use. At the end of the programme, it is revealed which buildings have been chosen to make the final shortlist.(n)

programme.title: Three Wives, One Husband
programme.desc: The documentary focuses on the complications of bereavement in the Rockland community. Melinda and Anazella's husband Jim recently died of cancer. His dying wish was for his brother Abel to marry his two widows and bring up his seven children - but Abel has three wives already, and the prospect of further upheaval is daunting for them. Although Jim's death has united Melinda and Anazella in grief, they must now choose whether to stay together as a family and risk living through the heartache of plural marriage again, or go their own way.(n)

programme.title: Kitchen 999: Emergency Chefs
programme.desc: Chefs are known for being fiery and temperamental. But what happens when they walk out, leaving restaurants in the lurch? These days, desperate owners call the relief agency for an emergency chef, who must master unfamiliar menus, handle inexperienced staff and satisfy demanding owners and customers. Here, cameras follows three such chefs as they descend on a luxury London hotel, a Devon manor house and a busy Midlands pub.(n)

programme.title: Isis and the Battle for Iraq
programme.desc: Dispatches special investigating the other side of the war against the so-called Islamic State, looking into allegations of torture, execution and sectarian cleansing by the Shia militia against their fellow Iraqis. The film reports from outside Mosul, where Sunni refugees fleeing Isis face a new threat - potential imprisonment and torture by the militia. Reporter Ramita Navai goes undercover to meet victims and discovers that some groups are using the opportunity of the war against Isis to settle sectarian and historic scores.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Thirty-year-old Chris is admitted after sustaining a potentially life-threatening wound during a game with his friend Jack, who fired the inside shaft of a ballpoint pen into his abdomen using an air rifle. College student Lennon has injured his head after jumping into a door frame while kicking a balloon, while 74-year-old Stafford arrives at A&E because his internal cardiac defibrillator keeps shocking him.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: A couple who have spent their lives saving stray animals bring in a three-legged cat called Jersey, who has recently become lame in her single back leg. The vet must decide whether the first-ever hip replacement on a three-legged cat is viable. Plus, a Great Dane that is two metres long is given a custom-designed spinal implant, and a Dogue de Bordeaux gets help with elbow dysplasia.(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.desc: Florence and Nadine, two of Chester's Grevy's zebras, are about to give birth, but other animals are struggling to produce offspring, including Iblis the Asiatic lion. Meanwhile, warthog dad Magnum is feeling the pressure of parenting as two of his older children, Dobby and Neville, are becoming increasingly hard to control, and Magnum is losing his hair with the stress.(n)

programme.title: Dispatches
programme.sub-title: President Trump - How Scared Should We Be?: Channel 4 Dispatches.
programme.desc: Abi Austen travels to the US to find out what the age of Trump means in practice for the rest of the world. As the President has said that his foreign policy will be based on the principle of America First and has surrounded himself in the Oval Office by people who dispute the notion that the US has an obligation to maintain a stable international order, she asks just how worried we should be.(n)

programme.title: Unreported World

Reporter Kiki King visits Detroit, a city where two thirds of high school students struggle with basic reading and where things have deteriorated so much that a group of high school students is suing the state of Michigan for failing to teach them adequately.(n)

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: When Arthur has a fall, Doug installs a camera in the basement to keep a watchful eye on him - but Deacon, Spence and Danny become addicted to spying on the pensioner. programme.desc: Ray is upset to hear Debra has been discussing intimate details of their marriage with her gossipy friends - and responds by revealing a few secrets of his own. Guest starring Maggie Wheeler (Friends).(n)

programme.title: Unreported World
programme.desc: Shaunagh Connaire reports from Lebanon where an estimated one and a half million Syrian refugees have fled the war. She reveals that, despite offers of assistance from the international community, some of those most in need - refugee children with serious medical conditions - are dying while they wait for help. Several developed nations have promised to help the most vulnerable children and resettle them. However, it seems there are limits on medical grounds as to who is being accepted, resulting in some of the sickest children and their families being left stranded.(n)

However, the procedure could mean a delay to his christening. Meanwhile, Joseph, a young bladder cancer patient, hopes Dr Mio Kwan will sign him off work following an operation to remove the offending cells. Plus, Susan worries a stroke may be behind her unusual headaches and facial numbness, but Dr Manj Tawana has another diagnosis in mind - Horner's Syndrome - which is caused by nerve damage to the area of the neck.(n)

programme.desc: Women who claim benefits while looking after several children. They include Chesterfield mum Maria, who has five kids to five different dads and has not worked since 2002. She is so desperate to get off benefits she has signed herself up to the same college course as her daughter. Birmingham woman Karen has six children and a seventh on the way with partner Ashleigh - and although his job search is not going well he keeps himself busy in other ways. In Weymouth, Kate picks up almost £30,000 a year in benefits to supplement her husband Ian's income as a taxi driver - and spends more than £170 a month of this on pocket money for her seven kids.(n)

However, when they return to the surface, they must remain in a high-tech decompression chamber for four days. With each of their suspects confined within a tank, the NCIS team must complete an unorthodox investigation from the outside. Starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: Kate faces trouble from unruly tenants, who became anti-social, and are now trying to sue her for serving them an eviction notice. Dhiren relates how the existing tenant of a house he bought stopped paying rent as soon as he took ownership, and Tim explains how a health scare left him seeking to sell his property - but a standing occupant refused to leave.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.desc: The stories of four people who have spent a total of almost 90 years on benefits. They include Greater Manchester couple Irene and Steve, who between them have been claiming for 70 years. Irene suffers with agoraphobia, and until recently husband Steve received a care allowance to look after her, but after a recent assessment their money has been cut by £6,000. Plus, a 49-year-old woman who once worked in the benefits office, only for her arthritis to leave her relying on the system, and a 57-year-old Navy veteran who suffers post-traumatic stress disorder after his experiences in the Gulf War.(n)

programme.title: Rich House, Poor House
programme.desc: Families from opposite ends of the wealth and class divide swap homes, budgets and social status for seven days to discover how the other half lives. The Bentleys from Lincolnshire trade places with the Carter-Begbie family from Stamford. The Bentleys rank in the top 10 per cent of Britain's wealthy, and live in a large four-bedroom house with three bathrooms, two reception rooms, a top-of-the-range kitchen, conservatory and games room. The Carter-Begbies live in a rented three-bedroom house and have a weekly budget of £140. This week, however, that will rise to almost £1,800.(n)

programme.title: Shannon Matthews: The Mother's Story
programme.desc: The disappearance of nine-year-old Shannon Matthews in 2008 gripped the nation. Her mother Karen claimed that her daughter had gone missing on her way home from school, prompting a nationwide search. But weeks later, it was revealed that Karen had known the truth all along - Shannon was being kept hidden by a man known to her mother, who had plotted to claim the £50,000 reward money for her return. This documentary tries to get at the truth of a woman many have branded as evil, asking what drove her to do it, how she can rebuild her life and whether she is sorry for her actions.(n)

programme.title: When Kids Kill
programme.desc: Leah Green presents this documentary investigating the case of 18-year-old Lewis Daynes, who exploited schoolboy Breck Bednar's career aspirations in order to groom him online before killing him. Leah speaks to Breck's mother, who is determined to improve other children's awareness of online dangers.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino

programme.title: Caught on Camera

The first episode focuses on drunkenness and violence, with Nick going to Chester on a race day to find out how the local council and police are using cameras to deal with the 50,000 people descending on the city. Crime drama, guest starring Ralph Waite (The Waltons), with Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: The Gadget Show
programme.desc: Jon Bentley attempts to filter the bewildering array of prices charged for different coffeemakers, testing three machines costing £100, £600 and £3,500 respectively. Ortis Deley discovers the virtues of smart fabrics, in terms of cars seats that can jolt a driver at risk of nodding off and socks designed to help diabetics prevent foot ulcers. Plus, in her continued quest to try to improve the fortunes of lowly Monkey Tree FC, Georgie Barrat steps things up a gear, with specific tech for improving the boys' football skills.(n)

programme.title: Tony Robinson: Coast to Coast
programme.desc: The actor explores the Yorkshire Dales and in the town of Hawes, meets the team who came together to save local production of Wensleydale cheese by organising a management buy-out of the creamery after the parent company closed it down. Tony also visits the market town of Leyburn on calf auction day, before heading to Aysgarth Falls, a triple flight of waterfalls carved out of the River Ure. In the Swaledale valley, Tony joins in rehearsals of the Muker Silver Band, discovering the origins of this traditional brass outfit.(n)

programme.title: Spectacular Spain with Alex Polizzi
programme.desc: On the Costa Blanca, the presenter reveals how thriving port Valencia has much more to offer than just its sandy beaches. She samples horchata, a sweet drink made from tiger nuts and another local speciality - paella. She also visits the cathedral, where a small chapel houses an ancient chalice believed by some to be the Holy Grail. Further south is Benidorm, where Alex explores its transformation from a quiet fishing village to a high-rise holiday resort. Finally, she visits the tiny island of Tabarca, only a short boat trip away from the mainland but part of a very different world.(n)

programme.title: Dog with an IQ of 142
programme.desc: Brainbox pets and others animals, from a canine Einstein that makes the news after mastering a shape-sorting puzzle that most toddlers struggle with to a prize pooch entered into a competition for trick dogs. Scientific research is also proving how supposedly dumb animals like goats and donkeys are cleverer than people might think. This is demonstrated by a Kent woman who has taught her pet raccoon a remarkable range of skills, such as pushing a toddler's scooter and even riding a bicycle.(n)

programme.title: A Year in the Wild
programme.sub-title: Yorkshire: A Year in the Wild: Autumn.
programme.desc: Autumn is on hold as summer continues, with unexpectedly balmy conditions throwing a life line to the roe deer as they prepare for the winter ahead. For other animals, mating season has arrived, making for a dangerous and testosterone-fuelled time at Ravenscar Beach.(n)

programme.desc: Forrest Taft works for Aegis oil company in Alaska. The company's corrupt CEO, Michael Jennings doesn't care whether or not oil spills into the ocean or onto the land as long as it's making money for him. He even makes commercials that make him look like he cares for the environment. When Taft's best friend Hugh Palmer hides a computer disk that Jennings needs, Jennings sees Hugh as a major threat, and has Hugh murdered(n)

programme.title: The Darkness
programme.desc: During a family camping trip at the Grand Canyon, a young boy (David Mazouz) stumbles upon an ancient Native American burial ground. He takes five sacred stones from there back to his suburban home, unaware that they contain a malevolent supernatural force. This tale of terror was directed by Wolf Creek's Greg McLean. Kevin Bacon, Radha Mitchell, and Lucy Fry star in a Blumhouse Productions film(n)

programme.desc: Nelson is a man devoted to his advertising career in San Francisco. One day, while taking a driving test at the DMV, he meets Sara. She is very different from the other women in his life. Nelson causes her to miss out on taking the test and later that day she tracks him down(n)

programme.title: Rush Hour 3
programme.desc: Brett Ratner's martial-arts action-comedy sequel starring Chris Tucker and Jackie Chan. When the Chinese Ambassador to the US is shot while divulging the whereabouts of a major Triad leader, the American authorities once again send Chief Inspector Lee and Detective James Carter into the fray. Lee quickly corners the would-be assassin, Kenji, but Lee's shock at coming face-to-face with an old friend gives the baddie just enough time to escape. Kenji's trail leads the mismatched cops to Paris, where car chases and a sequence among the under-dressed dancers of the Folies Bergère await them, plus rather a lot of dodgy French stereotypes and a finale atop the Eiffel Tower. Also starring Youki Kudoh and Noémie Lenoir, together with, in unlikely cameos, Max von Sydow and Roman Polanski(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson drives the Jaguar F-Type sports car on some of Britain's finest roads, while Richard Hammond jumps inside the Range Rover Sport and gives it a thorough workout off-road, on a track and in what he believes is its most natural habitat - the lanes of Cheshire. James May goes for a countryside adventure in the New Routemaster London bus brought into use in 2013, which is propelled by a turbodiesel generator and a powerful electric motor. Inspired by the machines they have tested, the trio then meet to celebrate Britain's motor industry with a grand finale in front of Buckingham Palace. Plus, former Formula One driver Mark Webber takes to the track for a lap in the Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The trio of motoring enthusiasts embark on another epic road trip, this time across western America in front-engined supercars. Jeremy Clarkson pilots the Lexus LFA, which has a spectacularly high-revving V10 powerplant, Richard Hammond gets behind the wheel of the muscular Dodge Viper, and James May opts for the latest incarnation of Aston Martin's Vanquish. On their journey from Las Vegas to Palm Springs via Los Angeles, the presenters tackle racing circuits and find themselves in a race against the police, before rushing to the Mexican border - and there's a terrifying penalty for the last man to arrive. Meanwhile, Fleetwood Mac drummer Mick Fleetwood rolls up his sleeves to thrash the Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: Pilot episode of the crime drama, starring Amanda Redman as Superintendent Sandra Pullman, a rising star of the Met who is sidelined after a failed hostage rescue. Put in charge of a new department, she is dismayed to discover the unit is to be manned by a motley crew of old-school former detectives who know little about modern police procedure. However, when they re-examine the case of a man whose conviction for murder 20 years ago has just been overturned, their combined experience and unorthodox methods bring interesting results. Alun Armstrong, Dennis Waterman and James Bolam play Redman's veteran team, with Jon Finch, Tim Woodwork and Philip Bretherton.(n)

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Two weeks' military leave is all it takes for US Army Staff Sergeant John Tyree and college student Savannah Curtis to fall in love in this Lasse Hallström-directed adaptation of Nicholas Sparks' novel. Having depended on letters to keep their romance alive, their relationship falters when John unexpectedly decides to re-enlist in the army following the September 11 attacks in New York. Then it arrives - the Dear John letter informing him that Savannah is engaged to someone else. With no hope of being together, John rededicates himself to the military, surviving injury and only seeing Savannah when family events force him to return home. Months later, John receives another letter from Savannah with their sign-off of old, 'I'll see you soon, then'. Could there be hope for the couple yet? Edited for language and violence(n)

However, when the gathering gets out of control, Beverly has to come to their rescue. Elsewhere, Adam annoys Murray by talking to Dana on the phone for hours on end.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Leonard invent excuses to avoid having to attend Penny's performance in a production of the stage musical Rent, but maintaining the pretence makes matters increasingly complicated. Johnny Galecki, Simon Helberg and Kaley Cuoco star, with DJ Qualls.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon falls ill, and his friends decide to go to a Planet of the Apes movie marathon to keep their distance, knowing he will be in a terrible mood. However, an unsuspecting Penny offers to nurse him. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Simon Helberg and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Marshall's car breaks down for good just before reaching 200,000 miles, prompting the gang members to recall the adventures they had in it over the years. Lily and Robin reveal why there are two chopsticks in the glove box instead of cigars, and Ted tells the story of how he tried to teach Barney to drive. Comedy, starring Neil Patrick Harris and Cobie Smulders.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Ted prepares to move in with Robin - until Barney resorts to drastic measures to scupper their plans. Meanwhile, Marshall and Lily excitedly look forward to having the apartment to themselves, until they start to realise how dependent they have become on Ted. Guest starring Rachelle Lefevre (Twilight).(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Peralta is put in charge of Captain Holt's security after he receives several death threats - a responsibility he not only enjoys, but also abuses as much as he can. Santiago tries to encourage her colleagues to take a Christmas photo, only to be met with a lack of enthusiasm - and Diaz's refusal to smile. US cop comedy, starring Andy Samberg.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Peralta tries to make a deal with a suspect Diaz has just arrested in an attempt to catch a car thief he has been tracking for years. Boyle's colleagues set out to meet his every need when he returns to work after being shot in the line of duty, and Captain Holt struggles to find a home for two puppies.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly is disappointed with her unenthusiastic family during the holidays, so she creates `Super Hanukkah' to get them into the spirit, and Adam offers Barry a dare.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam and Barry team up to form a rap super-group just like the Beastie Boys. Beverly puts pressure on Murray to let her redesign the kitchen, but when he refuses to allow it she comes up with a devious plan.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny becomes addicted to an online game based on the world of Conan the Barbarian. As her obsession intensifies, she begins to neglect her friends and seeks the company of the usually snide Sheldon, whom she continually pesters for advice. Starring Kaley Cuoco and Jim Parsons.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Elated at being named one of People magazine's `30 to Watch Under 30', Raj makes a pass at Penny and becomes very arrogant, making it hard for Leonard to maintain a positive perspective on his friend's new-found confidence. Guest starring Charlie Sheen.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Grace confides in Frankie and Jack that she's worried about Esther, and Tegan tries to win over Liam, but his eye wanders to Courtney. Elsewhere, Maxine can not help but think that Adam has made up his mind about who he wants to be with.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Lainey tries to set her father up with a `woman of interest' by using new video dating technology. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The gang's annual trip to Comic-Con is thrown into doubt when Raj, who is no longer accepting his father's financial support, cannot afford to go.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The friends offer a place for Raj to live, only for it to create unexpected conflict among everyone and an argument between Amy and Leonard's mother.(n)

programme.title: Gap Year
programme.desc: The gang sign up to be extras in a Malaysian zombie film, with Greg fulfilling his childhood dream of being a policeman. The love triangle reaches an explosive climax.(n)

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers
programme.desc: Visitors to the studio include bride-to-be Hayley, whose cheeky cartoon tattoo is threatening to derail her wedding plans, while Sketch helps reformed bad boy Mick to cover up an X-rated inking that's causing embarrassment to his daughter. Alice assists best friends Tommy and Wally, who tattooed each other while drunk on holiday, and Jay deals with Steve's embarrassing collection of stick men on his leg.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon stumbles upon a major scientific breakthrough, causing him to feel like a fraud, while Penny steps up her game with Leonard after seeing Howard make a romantic gesture to Bernadette. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons, Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is hurt when Professor Proton (Bob Newhart) contacts Leonard for help, so he befriends TV scientist Bill Nye, and Raj gets jealous when Howard crashes a girls' night in making home-made jewellery. Starring Jim Parsons, Johnny Galecki, and Kunal Nayyar.(n)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Dating show in which singletons meet up with potential partners at a restaurant, including Texan-born Aaron, who wants to know how to charm British women, and aspiring politician Louis, who returns hoping it will be second time lucky.(n)

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers
programme.desc: Visitors to the studio include bride-to-be Hayley, whose cheeky cartoon tattoo is threatening to derail her wedding plans, while Sketch helps reformed bad boy Mick to cover up an X-rated inking that's causing embarrassment to his daughter. Alice assists best friends Tommy and Wally, who tattooed each other while drunk on holiday, and Jay deals with Steve's embarrassing collection of stick men on his leg.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Peralta and Holt find the motivation to help Captain CJ with a big case that is proving a problem. Diaz and Boyle take a break from the night shift to visit a foot massage parlour.(n)

programme.title: Gap Year
programme.desc: The gang sign up to be extras in a Malaysian zombie film, with Greg fulfilling his childhood dream of being a policeman. The love triangle reaches an explosive climax.(n)

programme.title: Rude Tube
programme.desc: Alex Zane counts down the top 50 online videos devoted to love, sex, marriage, dating and everything in between, including 50 shades of Lego.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Russell's father visits New York and makes a surprise proposal. Jeff and Audrey come to regret their decision to allow Adam and Jennifer to share their bathroom for a week after the couple's water supply is turned off. Comedy, starring David Spade and Patrick Warburton.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Jennifer and Adam consider buying their apartment, and Audrey and Jeff offer to write a letter of recommendation - but their good deed backfires. Bianca Kajlich and Oliver Hudson star.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel is pleased when Lennox begins dating the mayor's son, believing he will be a good influence on her. Meanwhile, Ryder spends time with an elderly lady when he takes part in his school's community service programme. Family comedy, starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Billy Zane guest stars as a reformed demon who is eager to make up for past mistakes by teaching kids at the magic school about the wrongs of the evil path. But a cruel sorcerer is intent on seeing him fail and casts a spell that ruins his chances and could expose the true identity of the Charmed Ones. Supernatural adventure, starring Rose McGowan, Alyssa Milano and Holly Marie Combs.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Kim is trying to keep Grace away from Esther, but Grace is beginning to worry. Elsewhere, Darren's money troubles get worse when his car breaks down, and he panics when Nancy suggests that they should go quad biking for the day as one of their bucket list activities.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: On day 20, a whitewater rafting trip in Tuscany goes badly wrong for one tourist and Brendan Sheerin plays the superhero lifesaver. More new arrivals burst on to the scene, but not before there's a sad surprise departure.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Ben enlists Riley's help to prove to the bar's owner that he is responsible enough to fill the new manager's job, but his tactic of posing as a family man soon backfires. Bonnie buys baby Emma a very girly pushchair, but Tucker and Danny exchange it for one they believe to be much cooler in the hope of attracting the attention of women.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.sub-title: Take Her Out of the Ballgame.
programme.desc: Riley stands in as captain of softball league team after they keep losing, but her competitive side soon takes over and she starts taking the role too seriously, while Danny finds out that Bonnie is dating his hockey coach.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Russell agrees to host a photoshoot in his apartment for Audrey's magazine in the hope of getting a date with a model, while Jeff and Jennifer discover unexpected common interests.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Audrey tries to get free theatre tickets by keeping Russell's love of Broadway musicals a secret, while Adam and Jennifer learn how to dance in preparation for the wedding.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: For the first time in his career, Jake has a growing number of cases he just can't seem to solve, and the other detectives worry his run of bad luck will rub off on them. Holt asks Amy to take charge of a community outreach programme for at-risk youths, and Boyle helps Jeffords with a tough personal assignment. Comedy, starring Andy Samberg and Andre Braugher.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Jake meets an attractive medical examiner at a crime scene, but annoys his colleagues when his attempts to get together with her cause a hold-up with an autopsy report. Meanwhile, Amy discovers Jeffords has some hidden talents when the police sketch artist goes off sick.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel asks Joe to act as a translator when she has a meeting with a Japanese businessman, but things turn a little awkward when they all get together for dinner. Meanwhile, Lennox and her nemesis are forced to work on a school project together. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Despite everything that has happened to him over the past year, Joe decides to go to his college reunion to see his former classmates. However, when his date for the event cancels on him, Mel feels she must try to find a solution to the problem. Meanwhile, Lennox and Ryder plan to throw a party. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Dr Shaw decides that Riley is the reason Danny cannot focus during ice hockey and bans her from his next match. Meanwhile, Riley worries things are moving too fast with Fitch, and Tucker competes with Jenna for a promotion at work. Comedy, starring Chelsea Kane.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Ben tries to get Emma into daycare by flirting with the assistant manager, Megan, who insists there is no space, until she thinks that Ben and Tucker are a gay couple. Meanwhile, Riley worries that Dr Amy Shaw is trying to change Danny when he turns his back on their traditional `Halfaween' costume party. Comedy, starring Jean-Luc Bilodeau, and guest starring Grace Phipps and Lacey Chabert.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Planning to elope, Marshall and Lily drag the gang to Atlantic City, but face a three-day wait for a marriage licence. The delay gives the couple time to realise they would like to celebrate their marriage with their families. Alyson Hannigan and Neil Patrick Harris star.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Robin refuses to go to the mall, leading the group to wonder why she seems so determined to avoid the place, while Ted and Barney discuss women. Comedy, starring Josh Radnor and Cobie Smulders.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly tries to help Adam navigate a painless path through puberty, but just as his voice is changing, he is cast in the lead role of the school musical. Determined to help him survive the performance, Beverly decides lip-synching might be the answer. Meanwhile, Murray is irked when Erica chooses musician Johnny over Barry's sidekick Geoff as her date for the homecoming dance.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Barry accidentally records over one of Beverly's prized family videotapes - her treasured keepsake from his fifth birthday party. Meanwhile, Adam and Murray build a robot together, but the project comes between them when they experience creative differences.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon feels threatened by a 15-year-old physics prodigy who is even cleverer than he is, and asks Leonard to help him discredit the precocious teenager's research. Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons star.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard, Raj and Howard kick Sheldon off their physics quiz team and replace him with Leslie Winkle, so he decides to prove his superiority by forming a rival quartet of his own. Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons star.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Barney is thrilled to land a place on The Price Is Right, because he believes the host (Bob Barker, playing himself) to be his father. Meanwhile, Lily discovers she has lost so much weight her wedding dress no longer fits, so desperately tries to pile on the pounds. Comedy, starring Neil Patrick Harris and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Barney surprises everyone when he comes to the rescue on Marshall and Lily's wedding day, giving them the low-key affair they have always dreamed of. Alyson Hannigan and Neil Patrick Harris star.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Peralta and Santiago's ongoing bet about who can make the most arrests comes to an embarrassing conclusion, while Boyle receives a medal following the shooting, but his pain medication loosens his tongue and he starts to reveal what he really thinks of his colleagues.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: For his first task back in the field, Jeffords prepares to join Peralta and Boyle on a mission to infiltrate a gym where steroids are being sold illegally, but Peralta begins to have second thoughts about whether the sergeant is ready. Meanwhile, Santiago and Diaz try to determine who has burgled Gina's flat.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: In an attempt to get closer to Barry and Erica, Beverly promises to bring actor Scott Baio to town for a big charity event. Adam gets into a tricky situation when he arranges to take both his best friend Emmy and his girlfriend Dana to the school dance.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: After watching a particular game show together for years, Adam and Emmy are excited to learn that the producers will be holding auditions at their school. Beverly turns to Bill for help when Barry and Murray become convinced that she is a lucky charm for their beleaguered football team.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is forced to confront his fear of driving when both Penny and Howard refuse to give him a lift to work. Desperate to be free of the obligation, Leonard and the gang intervene to discover why their friend never learnt to drive. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons and Johnny Galecki, with Octavia Spencer (The Help).(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon acquires a girlfriend, who soon expresses distaste for his social life, and removes him from his limited circle of friends by forcing him to work on a troublesome scientific problem. Guest starring Riki Lindhome.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Liam's fury with Grace grows and he has a plan for those closest to her, Lynette hands Scott some devastating news, and Cleo gets jealous over Joel. Meanwhile, Nancy bumps into her first boyfriend Kyle at an MS meeting.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Boyle enlists Peralta's help in tracking down his son's favourite toy for Christmas, but they find themselves accidentally facing off against a Latvian crime ring as a result. Back at the precinct, the team members get ready for the annual Christmas carol competition against their rivals at the Metropolitan Transit Authority. Mary Lynn Rajskub (24) guest stars.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny and Leonard try to distract Sheldon from his career woes by reinstating Anything Can Happen Thursday, but it causes friction among the gang when Amy and Bernadette are caught lying. Meanwhile, Raj seeks Howard's help in preparing for a date with Emily. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: In the seventh series finale, Sheldon becomes upset about his career, the destruction of the comic-book store and Leonard and Penny's future living arrangements. programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: An underworld courier lives by a simple code - to never ask what he is transporting. Action adventure, starring Jason Statham, Shu Qi, Matt Schulze and Francois Berleand.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard becomes concerned that Sheldon will overreact when his friend learns the truth about a past indiscretion, while Penny confronts Raj's old flame Lucy about the way she ended their relationship. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is dismayed when the group spends the Thanksgiving holiday at Mrs Wolowitz's house, but hits it off with Bernadette's father. programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: The Wonder of Animals
programme.desc: Chris Packham examines the behavioural quirks of opportunist animals, including bears, which are specially adapted to thrive in varying climates across the world.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of the Earth
programme.desc: How Earth's metallic core turns the planet into a huge magnet, generating a field that protects people from dangerous cosmic rays and solar energy.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of the Earth
programme.desc: The science behind blizzards, which might be considered beautiful yet can bring entire cities to a grinding halt.(n)

programme.title: How Earth Made Us
programme.desc: Iain Stewart explores humanity's double-edged relationship with fire, which has simultaneously proven to be a crucial source of energy and a force for destruction. Along the way he takes a therapeutic bath in crude oil, and learns how fire played a vital role in the Industrial Revolution in Britain but held back China's development.(n)

programme.title: Life in the Undergrowth
programme.desc: David Attenborough turns his attention to the network of partnerships that invertebrates have developed with one another and with plants. He reveals how the fairy wasp, the world's smallest insect, flies underwater to inject its eggs into those of the water beetle. Footage also shows how the caterpillar of the blue butterfly smuggles its way into an ants' nest by mimicking the smell of their young.(n)

programme.desc: Chris Packham narrates the amazing work of ants and explains how they have worked together to achieve global success.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of the Earth
programme.desc: Steamy underworlds hiding mysterious treasures, extreme waters teeming with unique life, and jarring rock formations made of frozen lava.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of the Earth
programme.desc: Amazing secrets of how rain is made - some raindrops form around micrometeorites from space, while others are created by bacteria floating into the upper atmosphere.(n)

programme.title: How Earth Made Us
programme.desc: Having documented the planetary forces that have shaped the development of civilisations, Iain Stewart discovers how this relationship has been reciprocated. He examines how the advent of farming prevented the world from slipping into a new ice age, and demonstrates why humanity unwittingly caused a catastrophic mudslide in Indonesia. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Life in the Undergrowth
programme.desc: David Attenborough explores how insects compensate for their small size by banding together in vast numbers. He reveals that the operations of many of these societies are so finely tuned they appear to work as a single entity. Footage shows how African termite mounds act as huge ventilation systems of such sophistication that humans are only now beginning to unravel the mechanics of the structure.(n)

programme.title: The Wonder of Animals
programme.desc: Chris Packham narrates the amazing work of ants and explains how they have worked together to achieve global success.(n)

programme.title: Super Giant Animals
programme.desc: Steve Backshall travels across the world to encounter the largest animals he can find and discover the remarkable things their size enables them to do. Highlights include Steve swimming with Nile crocodiles in Botswana, dodging two-ton elephant seals in California and diving with sperm whales in the Caribbean.(n)

programme.title: The Anniversary Party
programme.desc: Jennifer Jason Leigh and Alan Cumming co-wrote, co-directed and costar in this well-acted, all-star comedy-drama about a show-business couple's sixth-anniversary bash---a daylong affair of sex, drugs, professional rivalries and personal grudges. Kevin Kline, Phoebe Cates, Gwyneth Paltrow, Jane Adams, John C. Reilly, John Benjamin Hickey, Parker Posey(n)

programme.title: Fired Up!
programme.desc: This peppy and uproarious teen romp is boosted by excellent performances from Nicholas D'Agosto and Eric Christian Olsen as Illinois high-school football stars who bag summer camp in red-hot Texas to try their luck at cheerleading camp instead. With 300 young ladies to hit on, it becomes more of a booty camp than boot camp for the two young lotharios. But before they know it, both get more involved, romantically and athletically, than they expected. Molly Sims. Directed by Will Gluck(n)

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: Academy Award(r) nominee Will Smith, Academy Award(r) winner Charlize Theron and Jason Bateman star in this fast paced action drama about a tortured superhero who crash-lands in Sheepshead Bay, Brooklyn, and tries to revitalise himself by romancing an alluring housewife, causing chaos in the city. Well-intentioned but hard-living, edgy, sarcastic and misunderstood, Hancock is not your everyday superhero. His heroics, while they might get the job done and save lives, always seem to leave jaw-dropping damage in their wake. Having fallen out of favour with the public, things don't look good for Hancock - until he saves the life of a PR executive(n)

programme.title: Lakeview Terrace
programme.desc: An interracial couple moves into their California dream home, only to find themselves the target of their volatile next-door neighbour -- a racist LAPD officer --(n)

programme.title: Good Day for a Hanging
programme.desc: When the sheriff of a small western town is murdered, Ben Cutler (Fred MacMurray) puts on a badge and organizes a posse to bring in the killer, a personable young hotshot known as The Kid (Robert Vaughn). Upon bringing The Kid back to town, Ben prepares to oversee his execution, only to discover that the townsfolk are in sympathy with the murderer and don't much care if he is punished. The longer The Kid remains in jail, the locals grow more and more fond of the prisoner, and begin working up strategies to prevent his date with the gallows. Much to his surprise, Ben is accused of being a cruel and sadistic man, and the evidence he has against the Kid is ignored and discredited--even by Ben's own daughter Laurie (Joan Blackman). It will take something more than Ben's word to convince his neighbors that they're wrong and he's right, and that "something more" isn't long in coming(n)

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: Touching drama based on the true life story of a coach who dropped out of minor league baseball because of an injury, aged 23, and coached high school baseball during the twelve years since. His team's surprise success means he must honour a promise to try out as a pitcher for a professional team, with inspiring results(n)

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: Blood, sweat and tears boxing movie which made a star of Sly Stallone. He's the unknown Philadelphia fighter given a shot at glory by heavyweight champ Apollo Creed(n)

programme.title: The White Queen
programme.desc: The Bad Queen. Lord Warwick's power grab turns desperate as old enemies form new alliances(n)

programme.title: How Stella Got Her Groove Back
programme.desc: Terry McMillan and Ron Bass wrote this screenplay based on McMillan's semi-autobiographical best-selling novel (over 2,000,000 copies in print before the release of this film). San Francisco stockbroker Stella (Angela Bassett), a 40-year-old divorcee, has a nice Marin County home and an 11-year-old son, Quincy (Michael J. Pagan). With Quincy off to see his dad, Stella and her best friend Delilah (Whoopi Goldberg) vacation in Jamaica, where she meets sexy, good-looking Winston Shakespeare (Taye Diggs). He's the man of her dreams in every way except one -- he's half her age. Even so, a romance develops. Grammy Award-winning songwriters Jimmy Jam and Terry Lewis supervised the film's music and produced the R&B-slanted soundtrack album. Shown at the 1998 Urbanworld Film Festival (NY)(n)

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: Academy Award(r) nominee Will Smith, Academy Award(r) winner Charlize Theron and Jason Bateman star in this fast paced action drama about a tortured superhero who crash-lands in Sheepshead Bay, Brooklyn, and tries to revitalise himself by romancing an alluring housewife, causing chaos in the city. Well-intentioned but hard-living, edgy, sarcastic and misunderstood, Hancock is not your everyday superhero. His heroics, while they might get the job done and save lives, always seem to leave jaw-dropping damage in their wake. Having fallen out of favour with the public, things don't look good for Hancock - until he saves the life of a PR executive(n)

programme.title: Signs
programme.desc: A atmospheric, suspenseful story about a disillusioned ex-minister who discovers mysterious crop circles on his farm(n)

programme.title: Leaving Las Vegas
programme.desc: Ben Sanderson, a hard-core alcoholic, drives to Las Vegas after being fired from his film production job and divesting himself of all possessions. He plans to drink himself to death within four weeks. He meets Sera, a prostitute; they fall in love and he moves in with her. Each pledges not to try to change the other's chosen destiny, and they carry on a romance over Ben's last weeks(n)

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A construction worker pays to have fake memories of a dream holiday implanted into his brain, but discovers his mind has already been tampered with - apparently to erase his true identity as a secret agent from a colony on Mars. He journeys to the planet in search of the truth, but is drawn into a conflict between the tyrannical ruler and a rebel faction(n)

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: Touching drama based on the true life story of a coach who dropped out of minor league baseball because of an injury, aged 23, and coached high school baseball during the twelve years since. His team's surprise success means he must honour a promise to try out as a pitcher for a professional team, with inspiring results(n)

programme.title: Sweet Home Alabama
programme.desc: Romantic comedy in which a New York fashion designer must confront her white trash past - specifically the redneck childhood sweetheart to whom she is still married - in order to gain the divorce that will enable her to wed her new beau(n)

programme.title: That Thing You Do!
programme.desc: Warm, nostalgic comedy drama depicting a college band's rise to stardom in the 1960s. After a successful talent show appearance, The Wonders are snapped up by a record company and given their own manager. Setting off on a nationwide tour to promote their first single, 'That Thing You Do!', they encounter all the trappings - and some of the drawbacks - of fame(n)

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A construction worker pays to have fake memories of a dream holiday implanted into his brain, but discovers his mind has already been tampered with - apparently to erase his true identity as a secret agent from a colony on Mars. He journeys to the planet in search of the truth, but is drawn into a conflict between the tyrannical ruler and a rebel faction(n)

programme.title: Roll Bounce
programme.desc: There's nothing Lil' about rapper Bow Wow's big-time performance in this amiable, entertaining coming-of-age tale, anchored by the strain between a widower (Chi McBride) and his son (Bow Wow), who's caught up in the roller-disco scene in 1970s Chicago. Wesley Jonathan, Jurnee Smollett, Meagan Good, Brandon T. Jackson, Marcus T. Paulk, Rick Gonzalez, Khleo Thomas, Kellita Smith, Mike Epps, Charlie Murphy, Wayne Brady(n)

programme.title: There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: Lovelorn Ben Stiller hires sleazy investigator Matt Dillon to track down childhood sweetheart Cameron Diaz. Gross-out gag fest of hair gel, horny hounds and humiliation(n)

programme.title: That Thing You Do!
programme.desc: Warm, nostalgic comedy drama depicting a college band's rise to stardom in the 1960s. After a successful talent show appearance, The Wonders are snapped up by a record company and given their own manager. Setting off on a nationwide tour to promote their first single, 'That Thing You Do!', they encounter all the trappings - and some of the drawbacks - of fame(n)

programme.title: The White Queen
programme.desc: War at First Hand. Lancaster is restored to the throne, with Warwick in control. But rumours that Edward is returning with an army unsettle the court. Anne and Margaret of Anjou sail from France, uncertain they will reach Warwick in time to win. Divided families face each other across the battlefield. Can Elizabeth's witchcraft save her husband, or will Warwick triumph? As many fall in the battle, everyone's fortunes change forever(n)

programme.title: Sweet Home Alabama
programme.desc: Romantic comedy in which a New York fashion designer must confront her white trash past - specifically the redneck childhood sweetheart to whom she is still married - in order to gain the divorce that will enable her to wed her new beau(n)

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is at his best in this comedy-drama about a sports agent who falls from the top of his profession. Jerry Maguire is a key agent at Sports Management International, with a string of high-profile clients, a stunning girlfriend called Avery (Kelly Preston) and all the friends he could want. But Jerry wants something else - a more caring spirit within his company. After setting out his ideas in a mission statement, Jerry finds himself unceremoniously fired, and everything he has worked so hard to achieve suddenly disappears. Fortunately, he is able to take with him one member of staff - single mother Dorothy Boyd (Renee Zellweger) - and one reluctant client, Rod Tidwell (Cuba Gooding, Jr). Armed with nothing but his charm, his good looks and the ability to sell just about anything to just about anyone, Jerry begins the long fight back to the top(n)

programme.title: In Too Deep
programme.desc: An undercover cop becomes too close to an Ohio drug lord, ultimately endangering the police operation(n)

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: The US Navy's plans to develop an unmanned fighter are thrown into turmoil when the aircraft's onboard computer assumes independent control and embarks on its own mission. The three pilots who have been assisting with testing must then take drastic action to prevent the rogue aircraft from instigating a war(n)

programme.title: Flood
programme.desc: An engineer races to devise a plan that will save London from a massive storm surge threatening to destroy the city and kill millions(n)

programme.title: Flood
programme.desc: As the drama concludes, London is submerged, and it's up to Rob, Sam and Leonard to find a way to drain the city - and save millions of lives in the process(n)

programme.title: Beer for My Horses
programme.desc: When his girlfriend is kidnapped by a Mexican drug lord, a small-town lawman sets out with his bumbling fellow deputy to rescue her. Country music superstar Toby Keith and comedian Rodney Carrington cowrote and costar in this raucous comedy-adventure. Ted Nugent, Claire Forlani, Tom Skerritt(n)

programme.title: Freetown
programme.desc: From director Garrett Batty comes a drama based on true events of Liberian missionaries during their country's civil war. Six missionaries and a local minister in Monrovia seek asylum in Freetown, Sierra Leone in the midst of a brutal civil war in the 1990s. To reach religious and personal freedom, they must traverse their war-torn home country and evade rebels out to kill one of their own. This story of hope and perseverance is set amid a backdrop of incredible odds(n)

programme.title: Bloodsport
programme.desc: American special forces commando Frank Dux goes AWOL to compete in the Kumite, a clandestine martial arts contest held in Hong Kong. Action(n)

programme.title: Beer for My Horses
programme.desc: When his girlfriend is kidnapped by a Mexican drug lord, a small-town lawman sets out with his bumbling fellow deputy to rescue her. Country music superstar Toby Keith and comedian Rodney Carrington cowrote and costar in this raucous comedy-adventure. Ted Nugent, Claire Forlani, Tom Skerritt(n)

programme.title: Rocky III
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone returns to the character which made him famous in this wildly successful sequel. Rocky III starts with the Italian Stallion so famous that his likeness is everywhere, including pinball machines. Fame and complacency soon cause Balboa to lose his title to young thug Clubber Lang (Mr. T), who inadvertently causes the death of Rocky's beloved trainer, Mickey (Burgess Meredith), before their first championship bout. After sinking into a depression, Balboa must regain the love and support of his family, as well as the elusive "eye of the tiger," the hungry need to beat the opponent which former foe Apollo Creed (Carl Weathers) teaches him during this film's de rigueur training sequence. In the end, Balboa faces off against Lang for a second time. "Eye of the Tiger," the theme song Stallone commissioned from the band Survivor, became a huge hit single(n)

programme.title: Bloodsport
programme.desc: American special forces commando Frank Dux goes AWOL to compete in the Kumite, a clandestine martial arts contest held in Hong Kong. Action(n)

programme.title: Freetown
programme.desc: From director Garrett Batty comes a drama based on true events of Liberian missionaries during their country's civil war. Six missionaries and a local minister in Monrovia seek asylum in Freetown, Sierra Leone in the midst of a brutal civil war in the 1990s. To reach religious and personal freedom, they must traverse their war-torn home country and evade rebels out to kill one of their own. This story of hope and perseverance is set amid a backdrop of incredible odds(n)

programme.title: Anacondas: The Hunt for the Blood Orchid
programme.desc: A corporate research team goes on an expedition through the Borneo jungle to find a rare and valuable flower. But their search is hampered by in-fighting, the elements... and a giant, ravenous snake(n)

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: PRIMEVAL is the story of an American news crew sent to Burundi, Africa, by its network chief to hunt and capture the legendary crocodile Gustave, who stalks a local river in search of human prey. The small crew consisting of embattled producer Tim Manfrey, reporter Aviva Masters, and their cameraman Steven Johnson are joined by two animal experts: one a Steve Irwin-style croc hunter, the other a local named JoJo(n)

programme.title: The Condemned 2
programme.desc: A bounty hunter must fight to stay alive as he plays a deadly game, created by a wealthy and evil mastermind, in which he must hunt down his opponents before they are able kill him(n)

programme.title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
programme.desc: The sci-fi space-capades of futuristic bounty hunters who patrol the galaxy in a banged-up spaceship called the Bebop(n)

programme.title: Gunmen
programme.desc: This film opens with a big fat close-up of a sweaty prisoner with a fly (on a string) crawling on his face. The prisoner quickly pops the fly in his mouth and spits it out. Then he leeringly laughs about it to the prisoner next door. Nope. This is not a bad undiscovered Sergio Leone spaghetti western. Rather it is the opening shot Deran Sarafin's Gunmen -- a brainless action film without an original thought in its head. Christopher Lambert is the fly-eater, a man named Dani Servigo, the brother of a dead smuggler and a prisoner in a South American jail, who holds the secret to the whereabouts of $400,000 in stolen drug money. The walls of the prison explode, and Cole Parker (Mario Van Pebbles) makes his entrance. Cole is a mercenary working with the DEA who is in this South American hellhole to mop up the drug traders and to avenge his father's death at the hands of the drug traders. He wants Dani to lead him to the gold. In this love-hate buddy film, the two thrown-together friends/enemies race through the Amazon jungle with ruthless assassins in pursuit, as they all gravitate towards the secret stash of money(n)

programme.title: Supernova
programme.desc: At the center of the galaxy, an asteroid collides with the storm-tossed sun, sending powerful electromagnetic waves shimmering across the universe toward Earth. Dr. Austin Shepard observes in horror, through a powerful telescope, as the waves of electromagnetic radiation are heading for earth. He fears for the disastrous consequences it may have on the entire planet. (Part 2 of 2)(n)

programme.title: Burn Notice
programme.desc: With the help of Sam and Jesse, Michael tries to find out who was pursuing Fiona, and discovers a jail guard shot dead at his house. Anson's right-hand-woman Rebecca is on the scene, and takes Sam hostage as she flees to the Everglades, forcing Michael and Jesse to chase after them without help from the police or CIA. While their colleague remains in peril, Fiona is faced with two deadly prison assassins.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the death of a paparazzo, who appears to have killed himself by jumping out of a hotel window. They discover a popular celebrity may have been the target of the photographer's prying camera. Meanwhile, calls from a female colleague to Fritz stir up feelings of jealousy in Brenda. Drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The dismembered body parts of an adult-film star are found in a skip, prompting Brenda and the team to look for more clues to solve the puzzle. However, once they begin gathering the evidence, the suspect list gets increasingly longer. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Goren and Eames' investigation into the murder of an undertaker leads them to discover a field of decomposed corpses. The detectives soon turn their attentions to the owner of a nearby crematorium and his shady relationship with a contract killer. Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe star.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A social services worker and a deputy mayor are murdered, and the detectives discover a link to a 10-year-old mathematics prodigy and his obsessive, pushy father. Starring Vincent D'Onofrio, with Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The American crime drama returns with the team still reeling from the Department of Defence investigation, with Ziva, McGee and Tony having handed in their badges. Parsons continues his inquiries into Gibbs and his agents, but events take a turn when an explosion kills the Secretary of the US Navy and seriously injures the director of Homeland Security. When attempts are made on the lives of Gibbs and Tony, it appears that all of the NCIS agents are in mortal danger. Starring Mark Harmon and Colin Hanks.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Sarah Porter, the new Secretary of the Navy, charges Gibbs and the team with finding terrorist group the Brotherhood of Doubt, which was responsible for killing her predecessor. She expects the group's next target to be billionaire Tomas Mendez, who spends his money trying to defeat terrorism, but whose motives may not be entirely altruistic. Meanwhile, Tony flies to Tel Aviv, where new Mossad director Orli Elbaz reveals they have a report of a possible sighting of Ziva at a kibbutz she went to as a child. Crime drama, guest starring Marina Sirtis.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda and the team try to solve the case of a mother and daughter whose drowned bodies have been found by fishermen. As events proceed, a surprising revelation helps them unravel the mystery. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A boy blames himself for the death of his friend, forcing Brenda to tread lightly to get to the bottom of the case. To make matters worse, the deceased child's mother makes accusations of her own. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: The murders of a university president and his assistant present the detectives with a number of suspects, including a controversial academic, a graduate student and an ambitious woman with her eye on the top job. Drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: An assistant district attorney takes the law into his own hands by gunning down a hired killer following a series of death threats. The finger of suspicion immediately points to his wife, but when cracks appear in the seemingly airtight case, Goren and Eames are led on a different trail. Spin-off drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team suspects foul play when a seaman who was set to testify before a grand jury dies before he can make his court appearance. When it becomes clear the man was murdered, the subsequent investigation reveals that a previously thwarted human-trafficking ring has been re-established. Meanwhile, a storm causes a massive power outage, and McGee seeks a room for the night among his colleagues. Naval crime drama, starring Sean Murray.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A woman is found murdered and Gibbs and McGee are called in when she is discovered to be carrying ID bearing the name Sgt Patricia Moreno, a US marine known to have died several years earlier. The victim is discovered to have come to America from Afghanistan and a necklace reveals a fingerprint that leads the team to a known assassin. Guest starring Lolita Davidovich.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter and the gang interview potential friends to fill the vacancy left by Cleveland's departure, and Brian learns that Quagmire hates him - and only makes matters worse when he tries to find out why.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Nobody seems to care when Brian accidentally runs over and kills a fellow dog, so he tries to convince his friends that they should value canine lives as much as those of humans. Meanwhile, Lois hires a maid who does not listen to Peter.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: The animated comedy following the exploits of CIA agent and `man's man' Stan Smith returns, as Stan relives the same Father's Day over and over again.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: A misunderstanding at school leads to Steve receiving an F on a test, and Stan jumps to the conclusion that his previously nerdy son has gone off the rails.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Carter has a heart attack and lapses into a deep coma, so Peter takes over the running of his company Pewterschmidt Industries, but becomes power-mad and ends up firing every member of the board of directors.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter hits his head and develops total amnesia, leaving Lois facing the task of reacquainting him with his friends and family - not to mention such skills as driving and having sex.(n)

programme.title: Rick and Morty
programme.desc: Beth and Jerry get romantic, while Rick, Morty and Summer mess up the time frame.(n)

programme.title: Rick and Morty
programme.desc: Morty tries to save a gas-based life form.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger becomes Steve's legal guardian, but his overzealous approach to parenting gets his adopted son's school principal fired. Meanwhile, Stan and Francine decide to make their own fun at the world's biggest water park.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan persuades his last single friend to get married so he can realise his dream of becoming a best man, but when he invites an ex-convict to the wedding, she jeopardises the event. Elsewhere, Ricky Martin causes Roger to doubt himself.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Snot is rejected after professing his love for Hayley, so Roger decides to give him a new love interest - by pretending to be Steve's female cousin. Meanwhile, Stan tries to live like a gentleman of the 1960s, complete with dark suits and dry martinis.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan and Francine argue over how to redecorate their home, and end up splitting the house down the middle and trying to live without each other - but the plan leads to disaster for the whole family.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Halloween arrives, and Peter joins forces with Joe to play a series of painful pranks on his friends and neighbours. Meanwhile, Brian teaches Stewie the basics of trick-or-treating, and Meg has high hopes for her first festively themed high-school party.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter receives tickets to a boxing match as a birthday gift, and ends up volunteering Lois to compete. To everyone's surprise, she proves to be a natural pugilist, prompting her hapless husband to become her fight promoter - little suspecting that she is using her marital frustrations as motivation in the ring.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan decides to alleviate the stresses of his hectic family life by buying a hot tub. However, he fails to count on his new purchase having an evil agenda of its own. Animated comedy, with the voice of show creator Seth MacFarlane, and guest star Cee-Lo Green.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Crossover episode in which characters from Family Guy and The Cleveland Show end up meeting the Smiths when a storm hits the towns of Quahog, Stoolbend and Langley Falls.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Burn Notice
programme.desc: The CIA offers to release Fiona from prison, but in return she must agree to aid in the apprehension of her arms supplier. Meanwhile, Michael tries to help Rebecca's brother who is in witness protection after testifying against a powerful crime family. Drama, starring Jeffrey Donovan.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda and the team try to solve the case of a mother and daughter whose drowned bodies have been found by fishermen. As events proceed, a surprising revelation helps them unravel the mystery. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A boy blames himself for the death of his friend, forcing Brenda to tread lightly to get to the bottom of the case. To make matters worse, the deceased child's mother makes accusations of her own. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: The murders of a university president and his assistant present the detectives with a number of suspects, including a controversial academic, a graduate student and an ambitious woman with her eye on the top job. Drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: An assistant district attorney takes the law into his own hands by gunning down a hired killer following a series of death threats. The finger of suspicion immediately points to his wife, but when cracks appear in the seemingly airtight case, Goren and Eames are led on a different trail. Spin-off drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team suspects foul play when a seaman who was set to testify before a grand jury dies before he can make his court appearance. When it becomes clear the man was murdered, the subsequent investigation reveals that a previously thwarted human-trafficking ring has been re-established. Meanwhile, a storm causes a massive power outage, and McGee seeks a room for the night among his colleagues. Naval crime drama, starring Sean Murray.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A woman is found murdered and Gibbs and McGee are called in when she is discovered to be carrying ID bearing the name Sgt Patricia Moreno, a US marine known to have died several years earlier. The victim is discovered to have come to America from Afghanistan and a necklace reveals a fingerprint that leads the team to a known assassin. Guest starring Lolita Davidovich.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The detectives deal with a case of mistaken identity, which is hampering a major investigation. Meanwhile, Brenda is called to testify in Pope's divorce settlement, but finds that both her career and reputation are at risk. Drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda races to the scene of three murders, but when she arrives the bodies are nowhere to be found. To solve the case, the team must first locate the victims before the hunt for the killer can begin. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Goren and Eames examine the murder of a mother-of-two. The investigation leads them to a counterfeiting operation and the home of an actor - who puts them on the trail of an important official document. Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe star.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Goren and Eames must find concrete evidence to convict a fraudster when they uncover a medical scandal during an investigation into the murders of two pharmaceutical delivery drivers. Detective drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team investigate when naval cryptanalyst Andrew Wells is shot dead in a park outside Baltimore. At the scene, Tony spots a man who was one of his informants from 15 years earlier when he was a police officer, but who went into hiding after a bid to bring down the Russian mobsters he worked for went wrong. Drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team works with Abigail Borin of the Coast Guard Investigative Service after a highly suspicious explosion and fire on board an oil rig kills a US marine corps reservist. Abby detects malware in the platform's computer systems, while Ducky finds traces on the victim's body that lead to a lawyer who works for the oil company. Back in the office, a prankster is bringing some light relief and although the likeliest suspect is Tony, he denies any involvement. Crime drama, guest starring Diane Neal.(n)

programme.title: NCIS

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Das Bus. Lisa Simpson (voice of Yeardley Smith) and her brother Bart (voice of Nancy Cartwright) are among the students at Springfield Elementary who take part in the school's Model United Nations program, and along with their classmates they board a bus for a mock UN conference being held in a neighboring town. The rattletrap bus runs off a bridge into the river below, and a freak wave sends the vehicle off to sea. Bus driver Otto (voice of Harry Shearer) is washed away, but the students arrive safely on a deserted island. The kids soon realize they'll have to fend for themselves until a rescue team arrives, and realizing there isn't much food on the island, they'll be forced to make do with the snacks left on the bus. Millhouse (voice of Pamela Hayden) is chosen to guard the food, but come morning, the snacks are gone and Millhouse claims a monster stole them. No one is willing to believe Millhouse, and as order breaks down, the kids devolve into a band of feral savages. Meanwhile back at home, Homer (voice of Dan Castellaneta) decides to start a home business to make some extra money, and launches an internet firm that seems ready to pay off when it attracts the attention of Bill Gates. "Das Bus" also features narration from guest performer James Earl Jones; the episode was first aired on February 15, 1998(n)
