However, as war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara unite with Freya in an attempt to end Ravenna's wicked reign once and for all. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Emily Blunt and Jessica Chastain.(n)

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: Married explorers Rick and Evelyn battle the newly resurrected mummy Imhotep and his ruthless partner, who have captured their son. The undead creature is heading for a confrontation with a legendary ancient warrior - with power over a magical army to be won. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz, John Hannah, Arnold Vosloo, Oded Fehr and Patricia Velasquez, with a brief appearance by Dwayne Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.(n)

programme.title: Freezer
programme.desc: Wisecracking ex-con Robert is kidnapped and held hostage in a walk-in freezer by Russian thugs, who are convinced he has $8million from them. As he struggles to fight back against the cold, he soon discovers he is not alone. Thriller, starring Dylan McDermott.(n)

programme.title: Stakeout
programme.desc: A detective leads the hunt for an escaped murderer. However, the case takes a complicated turn when he falls in love with the killer's former girlfriend while maintaining a surveillance operation on her - much to the disapproval of his jittery partner. Comedy thriller, starring Richard Dreyfuss, Emilio Estevez, Aidan Quinn, Dan Lauria and Madeleine Stowe.(n)

programme.title: Mercury Plains
programme.desc: A troubled teenager runs away from home and crosses the border into Mexico. He is recruited by a mysterious paramilitary organisation, that battles against drug cartels, supposedly in the pursuit of law and order, while actually stealing from the criminals. As the group's actions grow more violent, he searches for a way to escape with his life. Action adventure, starring Scott Eastwood, Angela Sarafyan and Andy Garcia.(n)

programme.title: Spectre
programme.desc: James Bond goes rogue after receiving a cryptic message that sets him on the trail of a secretive criminal network. While his colleagues face a new threat closer to home, Bond embarks on a globetrotting journey in search of the elusive mastermind behind the syndicate - whom he discovers may have links to his own past. Spy thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Christoph Waltz, Lea Seydoux and Ralph Fiennes.(n)

programme.title: Revenge of the Green Dragons
programme.desc: Two brothers living in New York's Chinatown in the 1980s rise quickly through the ranks of a local gang. When their organisation clashes with a rival, the siblings are targeted by a hard-bitten cop who is determined to clean up the streets. Crime drama, starring Ray Liotta, Justin Chon and Kevin Wu.(n)

programme.title: Stakeout
programme.desc: A detective leads the hunt for an escaped murderer. However, the case takes a complicated turn when he falls in love with the killer's former girlfriend while maintaining a surveillance operation on her - much to the disapproval of his jittery partner. Comedy thriller, starring Richard Dreyfuss, Emilio Estevez, Aidan Quinn, Dan Lauria and Madeleine Stowe.(n)

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: Fact-based crime thriller about the tortuous hunt for a mysterious serial killer who terrorised San Francisco in the late 1960s and early 1970s, and taunted the police and media with cryptic messages. Three men became obsessed with identifying the murderer after his reign of terror inexplicably stopped, but their fixation with the case took a heavy toll on their lives. Starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Robert Downey Jr, Mark Ruffalo and Brian Cox.(n)

programme.title: Spectre
programme.desc: James Bond goes rogue after receiving a cryptic message that sets him on the trail of a secretive criminal network. While his colleagues face a new threat closer to home, Bond embarks on a globetrotting journey in search of the elusive mastermind behind the syndicate - whom he discovers may have links to his own past. Spy thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Christoph Waltz, Lea Seydoux and Ralph Fiennes.(n)

programme.title: Knock Knock
programme.desc: A devoted husband is left at home alone when his family is away for the weekend. When two stranded women turn up on his doorstep, he invites them in and is tempted to take advantage of the opportunity - only to find himself drawn into a seductive and dangerous game of cat and mouse. Thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Lorenza Izzo and Ana de Armas.(n)

programme.title: Dying of the Light
programme.desc: A CIA agent is diagnosed with a degenerative condition that results in him being forced to retire from the world of intelligence. When he receives word that a terrorist who once tortured him has resurfaced, he goes rogue and sets out to assassinate the man while he is still able. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Anton Yelchin and Irene Jacob.(n)

programme.title: Deadly Sisters
programme.desc: Two sisters tire of their mother's alcoholism and a string of her abusive boyfriends, and plot to kill her. Thriller, starring Abigail Breslin, Georgie Henley and Mira Sorvino.(n)

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos.(n)

programme.title: Kite
programme.desc: A teenager living in a corrupt society dominated by violent street gangs swears revenge when her parents are murdered. Joining forces with her father's former partner on the police force, she journeys into the depths of the criminal underworld to learn the killers' identities. Crime thriller, starring India Eisley and Samuel L Jackson.(n)

programme.title: Solace
programme.desc: A psychic is recruited by the FBI to help them track down an elusive serial killer before he can strike again. The case takes a psychologically dangerous turn when he realises that the murderer he is searching for has mental powers of his own. Crime thriller, starring Anthony Hopkins, Colin Farrell and Jeffrey Dean Morgan.(n)

programme.title: Every Secret Thing
programme.desc: When a young child goes missing, suspicion falls on two teenagers previously convicted for killing a baby. Thriller, starring Elizabeth Banks, Diane Lane and Dakota Fanning.(n)

programme.title: The Trust
programme.desc: Two bumbling police officers working in the evidence room of a Las Vegas station are surprised to discover a bail receipt for an unusually high sum of money. They hatch a plan to find out where this money came from, and steal it for themselves. Comedy thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Elijah Wood and Jerry Lewis.(n)

programme.title: The Joker
programme.desc: A young cop is kidnapped by a masked serial killer. To keep himself alive, the captive detective must rely on the wisdom imparted to him by his older colleagues during their regular poker night, hoping that one of their tall tales might provide the inspiration he needs to outwit the murderer. Thriller, starring Beau Mirchoff and Ron Perlman.(n)

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: A top-secret government agency has developed a seemingly unbreakable code - only for an autistic boy to crack it in an instant. Assassins succeed in gunning down his parents, but a maverick FBI agent investigating their deaths finds the child hiding in a closet, and resolves to shield him from the hitmen on his trail. Thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Alec Baldwin and Miko Hughes.(n)

programme.title: Solace
programme.desc: A psychic is recruited by the FBI to help them track down an elusive serial killer before he can strike again. The case takes a psychologically dangerous turn when he realises that the murderer he is searching for has mental powers of his own. Crime thriller, starring Anthony Hopkins, Colin Farrell and Jeffrey Dean Morgan.(n)

programme.title: The Trust
programme.desc: Two bumbling police officers working in the evidence room of a Las Vegas station are surprised to discover a bail receipt for an unusually high sum of money. They hatch a plan to find out where this money came from, and steal it for themselves. Comedy thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Elijah Wood and Jerry Lewis.(n)

programme.title: Cape Fear
programme.desc: A psychopathic rapist is released from prison after 14 years and plots revenge on the defence attorney he blames for his imprisonment. Subjecting the lawyer and his family to a terrifying campaign of intimidation, he uses his knowledge of the law to stay untouchable. Martin Scorsese's thriller remake, starring Robert De Niro, Nick Nolte, Jessica Lange and Juliette Lewis, with cameo appearances by Gregory Peck, Robert Mitchum and Martin Balsam, who all appeared in the 1962 original.(n)

programme.title: Four Brothers
programme.desc: When their adoptive mother is killed in a robbery, her four sons reunite and swear vengeance on the murderers. But the background to her apparently random death turns out to be more complex than it first appeared, as the trail leads to corrupt cops and a notorious local gang boss. Thriller, starring Mark Wahlberg, Tyrese Gibson, Andre Benjamin, Garrett Hedlund, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Terrence Howard.(n)

programme.title: How Green Was My Valley
programme.desc: Residents of a Welsh mining community at the start of the 20th century struggle to come to terms with the decline in their traditional way of life. Oscar-winning drama, starring Walter Pidgeon, Maureen O'Hara, Donald Crisp and Roddy McDowall.(n)

programme.title: Closer to the Moon
programme.desc: Five high-ranking members of the Communist party in 1950s Romania rob a bank and very nearly get away with the crime. When they are finally arrested, they are sentenced to death - but before their execution, they are ordered to re-enact the heist on film, so it can be used in a propaganda movie. Fact-based comedy crime drama, starring Mark Strong and Vera Farmiga.(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Special
programme.desc: The making of the long-awaited horror comedy sequel, including interviews with Melissa McCarthy and the rest of the cast.(n)

programme.title: Cleopatra
programme.desc: The famous Queen sets out to consolidate her power after gaining control of the Egyptian kingdom. She seduces Julius Caesar and bears him a son, but the ambitious would-be tyrant is assassinated before she can take her place at his side, paving the way for her love affair with general Mark Antony - and a war for control of the Roman empire. Historical epic, starring Elizabeth Taylor, Richard Burton, Martin Landau, Rex Harrison, Hume Cronyn and George Cole.(n)

programme.title: Failure to Launch
programme.desc: A thirtysomething man has no intention of leaving the family home, so his exasperated parents respond by hiring a woman who earns her living enticing stay-at-home men to fall in love with her and then encouraging them to fly the nest. Romantic comedy, starring Sarah Jessica Parker, Matthew McConaughey, Kathy Bates and Zooey Deschanel.(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Answer The Call
programme.desc: Melissa McCarthy and other cast members of the rebooted Ghostbusters discuss the blockbusting 2016 comedy.(n)

programme.title: Steve Jobs
programme.desc: Danny Boyle's biopic of the technology entrepreneur, exploring his life through three pivotal moments over the course of 14 years. Jobs is passionately driven to revolutionise computing technology, but his dreams come at a price, with a devastating impact on both is relationship with his family and his own health. Starring Michael Fassbender, Kate Winslet and Seth Rogen.(n)

programme.title: Miracles From Heaven
programme.desc: A sick young girl with a rare illness finds herself cured after surviving a terrible accident. Drama, starring Jennifer Garner, Kylie Rogers and Martin Henderson.(n)

programme.title: Moulin Rouge
programme.desc: An idealistic writer is drawn to the decadent backstreets of Paris, determined to play a part in the bohemian revolution. He falls for a courtesan from the famous Moulin Rouge, but a scheming duke also covets her affections, setting the scene for tragedy. Baz Luhrmann's romantic musical, with Ewan McGregor, Nicole Kidman, Jim Broadbent, Richard Roxburgh and John Leguizamo. Featuring reworkings of pop songs by Nirvana, David Bowie, Elton John and others.(n)

programme.title: Fathers and Daughters
programme.desc: A writer still recovering from the death of his wife struggles to retain custody of his daughter as he develops a serious illness. Years later, his daughter is now an adult and faces up to the personal issues brought about by her chaotic childhood as she begins a new relationship. Drama, starring Russell Crowe and Amanda Seyfried.(n)

programme.title: Little Children
programme.desc: Two suburban parents stuck in unhappy marriages seek solace from their dull lives in a clandestine affair. Meanwhile, the arrival of a convicted sex offender in the neighbourhood sends their tightly-knit community into an uproar of suspicion and fear. Drama, starring Kate Winslet, Patrick Wilson, Jackie Earle Haley and Jennifer Connelly.(n)

programme.title: Time Traveller
programme.desc: An archaeologist is injured in a diving accident and ends up in a coma. In his dreams, he becomes a British soldier in 18th-century India, whose loyalties are divided as he encounters the treachery of Colonial traders and falls in love with a defiant warrior. Romantic fantasy adventure, starring Josh Hartnett, Bipasha Basu and Tamsin Egerton.(n)

programme.title: Zorba the Greek
programme.desc: A timid English writer arrives in Crete to open a mine for the family business and falls under the spell of a local peasant with a charismatic and inspiring zest for life. Drama, starring Anthony Quinn, Alan Bates, Irene Papas, Lila Kedrova and Sotiris Moustakas.(n)

programme.title: The Physician
programme.desc: A medieval Englishman grows up fascinated by medicine, but comes up against his society's limited knowledge of science. He learns of a great teacher in Persia, and goes in search of him hoping to learn healing skills - but is forced to keep his Christian faith a secret for fear of his life. Historical drama based on Noah Gordon's novel, starring Tom Payne, Ben Kingsley and Stellan Skarsgard.(n)

programme.title: Amistad
programme.desc: African slaves seize control of the vessel transporting them to Spain in 1839. Two surviving Spanish crewmen steer the ship to America, where the slaves are imprisoned for killing their captors - but an abolitionist lawyer argues the case for granting them their freedom. Steven Spielberg's historical drama, starring Anthony Hopkins, Morgan Freeman, Matthew McConaughey, Djimon Hounsou, Nigel Hawthorne and Pete Postlethwaite.(n)

programme.title: All Roads Lead to Rome
programme.desc: A teacher is reunited with her ex-boyfriend while staying in an Italian village. The former lovers are forced to work together when her teenage daughter and his 80-year-old mother steal a car and run away to Rome together, the former hoping to return home to her boyfriend and the latter planning to remarry against her son's wishes. Romantic comedy, starring Sarah Jessica Parker, Raoul Bova and Claudia Cardinale.(n)

programme.title: Far from the Madding Crowd
programme.desc: A headstrong Victorian woman inherits a sheep farm in a remote area of Dorset. She struggles to maintain her independence while being courted by three very different men - a stoic farmer, a dashing, reckless soldier and a lonely older man. Period drama based on Thomas Hardy's novel, starring Carey Mulligan, Matthias Schoenaerts, Tom Sturridge and Michael Sheen.(n)

programme.title: Demolition
programme.desc: A successful investment banker is left devastated by the death of his wife. A complaint to a vending machine company sets him off on a letter-writing campaign in which he makes a series of brutally honest personal admissions, providing him with the chance to make a fresh start in his life - as soon as he has finished destroying everything that used to matter to him. Drama, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Naomi Watts and Chris Cooper.(n)

programme.title: Awakenings
programme.desc: A research doctor in a New York psychiatric hospital provokes equal measures of professional interest and suspicion when he appears to have discovered a means of reviving patients who have been trapped in a catatonic state for over 30 years. Fact-based drama, starring Robin Williams, Robert De Niro, Julie Kavner, Penelope Ann Miller, Max von Sydow and Alice Drummond.(n)

programme.title: I Saw the Light
programme.desc: Biopic of influential country singer Hank Williams, exploring his tempestuous marriage and addiction to alcohol and painkillers. With Tom Hiddleston and Elizabeth Olsen.(n)

programme.title: Demolition
programme.desc: A successful investment banker is left devastated by the death of his wife. A complaint to a vending machine company sets him off on a letter-writing campaign in which he makes a series of brutally honest personal admissions, providing him with the chance to make a fresh start in his life - as soon as he has finished destroying everything that used to matter to him. Drama, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Naomi Watts and Chris Cooper.(n)

programme.title: The Great Gilly Hopkins
programme.desc: A feisty foster kid comes up with an outlandish scheme to be reunited with her birth mum. Coming-of-age drama, starring Kathy Bates, Glenn Close and Sophie Nelisse.(n)

programme.title: A Warrior's Tail
programme.desc: A boy escapes when his village comes under attack by a pack of hyenas, and goes to get help. He meets a magical white wolf, who leads him on a journey in search of a magician who can help them find a powerful warrior - but many danger's lie between them and the sorcerer's mountain home. Animated fantasy, with the voices of Milla Jovovich, Whoopi Goldberg and Sharon Stone.(n)

programme.title: Strange Magic
programme.desc: A fairy living in an enchanted forest tries to rescue her sister from a monstrous creature. Meanwhile, the magical kingdom is thrown into chaos by a love potion, that results in a series of unexpected romances. Animated fantasy musical, with the voices of Evan Rachel Wood, Alan Cumming and Kristin Chenoweth.(n)

programme.title: Minions
programme.desc: A race of strange, babbling yellow creatures has served the cause of evil throughout the history of the world. In the 1960s, three of these eternal henchmen get a job working for a criminal genius who is hatching a plot against the British crown - but while carrying out her orders, they uncover a threat to their whole species. Animated comedy, with the voices of Sandra Bullock, Pierre Coffin, Jon Hamm and Michael Keaton.(n)

programme.title: Minions: Sky Movies Special
programme.desc: A special look at the hotly anticipated Despicable Me spin-off, featuring the voices of Sandra Bullock and Jon Hamm.(n)

programme.title: The Muppets
programme.desc: Three fans of the famous puppet variety show discover a powerful businessman is going to knock down the Muppet theatre and drill for oil on the site. They track down frontman Kermit the frog and persuade him to reunite his co-stars, so they can put on one last performance to save the venue. Comedy, starring Jason Segel, Amy Adams and Chris Cooper, with songs by Bret McKenzie (Flight of the Conchords).(n)

programme.desc: A boy escapes when his village comes under attack by a pack of hyenas, and goes to get help. They track down frontman Kermit the frog and persuade him to reunite his co-stars, so they can put on one last performance to save the venue. Comedy, starring Jason Segel, Amy Adams and Chris Cooper, with songs by Bret McKenzie (Flight of the Conchords).(n)

programme.title: Save the Last Dance
programme.desc: A troubled teenager moves to a tough inner-city school after her mother's death, but struggles to settle into her vastly different life - until a new boyfriend helps her discover a fresh sense of purpose through the power of dance. Romantic drama, starring Julia Stiles, Sean Patrick Thomas and Kerry Washington.(n)

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancee's latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller.(n)

programme.title: The Great Gilly Hopkins
programme.desc: A feisty foster kid comes up with an outlandish scheme to be reunited with her birth mum. Coming-of-age drama, starring Kathy Bates, Glenn Close and Sophie Nelisse.(n)

programme.title: Save the Last Dance
programme.desc: A troubled teenager moves to a tough inner-city school after her mother's death, but struggles to settle into her vastly different life - until a new boyfriend helps her discover a fresh sense of purpose through the power of dance. Romantic drama, starring Julia Stiles, Sean Patrick Thomas and Kerry Washington.(n)

programme.title: Monster House
programme.desc: A boy becomes obsessed with a sinister elderly neighbour living in a creepy old house. On Halloween night, he and two friends discover the chilling truth - the house is alive and eats anything that comes too close, including children. Animated comedy horror, with the voices of Mitchel Musso, Sam Lerner, Spencer Locke, Steve Buscemi, Maggie Gyllenhaal and Jason Lee.(n)

programme.title: Dumbo
programme.desc: Disney animated adventure following the fortunes of a plucky young elephant with oversized ears. Mocked by his fellow circus performers, Dumbo finally finds a friend in an enterprising mouse, who helps the poor animal overcome his inhibitions and find fame and fortune as the world's only flying elephant. With the voices of Sterling Holloway and Edward Brophy, and an Oscar-winning score by Frank Churchill and Oliver Wallace.(n)

programme.title: Bambi
programme.desc: A young deer grows up in the forest, forming close friendships with other woodland creatures. When tragedy strikes, he is suddenly forced to fend for himself but ultimately becomes brave and resourceful enough to save his friends during a forest fire. Animated drama, with the voices of Bobby Stewart, Hardie Albright and Donnie Dunagan.(n)

programme.title: Zootropolis: Special
programme.desc: The making of Disney's animated buddy-cop comedy set in a world entirely populated by animals.(n)

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: A boy is raised by animals in the jungle, leading a carefree life with his friends, a laidback bear and a wise panther. The return of a ferocious tiger who hates humans places the youngster's life in danger, and his friends must persuade him to return to the safety of his own people. Disney animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, with the voices of Phil Harris and George Sanders.(n)

programme.title: Finding Nemo
programme.desc: Clownfish Nemo becomes separated from his friends on the Great Barrier Reef - but the thrill of being able to swim freely and away from his overprotective father turns to horror when he is netted by a diver. His distraught dad sets out on a mission to find him, while the youngster finds himself in a dentist's tropical tank. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe, Barry Humphries and Geoffrey Rush.(n)

programme.title: Top Cat Begins
programme.desc: The cunning alley cat assembles a gang of feline friends to steal diamonds from a gangster. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jason Harris and Chris Edgerly.(n)

programme.title: Inside Out: Special
programme.desc: The making of the Pixar animation, taking viewers inside the mind of a youngster as she copes with the emotional upheaval of moving to a new town and new school.(n)

programme.title: Bambi
programme.desc: A young deer grows up in the forest, forming close friendships with other woodland creatures. When tragedy strikes, he is suddenly forced to fend for himself but ultimately becomes brave and resourceful enough to save his friends during a forest fire. Animated drama, with the voices of Bobby Stewart, Hardie Albright and Donnie Dunagan.(n)

programme.title: Eight Below
programme.desc: An Antarctic scientific expedition has to be aborted when a blizzard hits, forcing their guide to leave behind his team of huskies in the frozen wilderness. He is determined to return and rescue the animals, but in the meantime, the dogs have to rely on pack instinct alone to ensure their survival in the hostile climate. Disney adventure, starring Paul Walker, Bruce Greenwood and Jason Biggs.(n)

programme.title: Toys
programme.desc: A dying toy-maker leaves the company to his brother, a power-mad general, who turns the friendly family factory over to the production of weapons. It falls to the general's zany nephew and his equally childlike sister to stand up for their father's benign world-view. Comedy, starring Robin Williams, Michael Gambon, Joan Cusack and Donald O'Connor.(n)

programme.title: Winter
programme.desc: A father consumed by grief must come to terms with an emotional breakdown in order to save his relationship with his two young sons. Drama, starring Tommy Flanagan, Edward Ashley and David Broughton-Davies.(n)

programme.title: Date and Switch
programme.desc: Two guys make a pact to lose their virginity before their senior prom, but things take an unexpected turn when one of them comes out of the closet. Comedy, starring Nicholas Braun, Hunter Cope and Dakota Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: A trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who is not as helpless as he seems, and their hopes of walking away with a massive fortune do not go to plan. Horror, starring Stephen Lang, Jane Levy and Dylan Minnette.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: The Man of Steel battles an evil tycoon, who has recruited a computer genius to aid his schemes for world domination. Together the villains hatch a plan to dispose of Superman once and for all - but instead of killing the superhero, they accidentally unveil his dark side. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Richard Pryor, Robert Vaughn and Margot Kidder.(n)

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The masked avenger stalks the streets of Gotham City, waging a nightly war against the criminal element. However, he may have met his match when the city's crime syndicate is taken over by the crazed Joker, who plans to poison the populace with toxic chemicals. Tim Burton's comic-book adventure, starring Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson and Kim Basinger.(n)

programme.title: Batman Returns
programme.desc: The masked hero returns to face the Penguin, a grotesque crime boss dwelling in the sewers who conspires with a corrupt businessman to make himself mayor. When the tycoon tries to kill his secretary, she returns as vengeful vigilante Catwoman, who soon forms an intense relationship with the dark knight in both their costumed and real identities. Tim Burton's comic-book adventure sequel, starring Michael Keaton, Danny DeVito and Michelle Pfeiffer.(n)

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell: Special
programme.desc: A look at the live-action remake of the iconic sci-fi animation, starring Scarlett Johansson, Takeshi Kitano and Michael Pitt.(n)

programme.title: The 5th Wave
programme.desc: Earth suffers a series of four devastating attacks from alien invaders, that leaves civilisation in ruins. As the human race awaits the fifth and final onslaught that will wipe them out, a teenage girl tries to protect her younger brother in a dangerous wilderness - and gets drawn into a plan to fight back against the aliens. Sci-fi adventure based on Rick Yancey's novel, starring Chloe Grace Moretz and Liev Schreiber.(n)

programme.title: Attack Of The Lederhosen Zombies
programme.desc: Trapped snowboarders fight for their lives when hordes of the undead terrorise a remote ski resort. Horror-comedy, starring Laurie Calvert, Gabriela Marcinkova and Oscar Dyekjaer Giese.(n)

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: An aspiring writer marries a British aristocrat, and goes to live with him and his sister in their sinister ancestral home. She is tormented by ghostly apparitions and seeks to uncover the terrifying secrets in the family's past. Guillermo del Toro's gothic horror, starring Mia Wasikowska, Tom Hiddleston and Jessica Chastain.(n)

programme.title: The Landlord
programme.desc: A newlywed couple move into a new home, where they hope to work through their marital tensions. They do not realise that they have a more disturbing problem to worry about, as their lecherous landlord is spying on their every move through a network of hidden cameras. Horror, starring Brianne Moncrief and PJ McCabe.(n)

programme.title: The Gallows
programme.desc: A high-school play ends in tragedy when a boy is accidentally killed during a performance. The school puts on another production of the same show 20 years later which a gang of camcorder-wielding students intend to sabotage - but nobody is prepared for the ghost of the dead boy returning to terrorise the performance. Found-footage horror, starring Reese Mishler and Pfeifer Brown.(n)

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: The son of the Greek god Zeus is raised by humans and grows up to reject his immortal heritage in anger at the gods' cruel treatment of humans. He sets out on a quest to find a means to kill the evil lord of the underworld in revenge for his father's death, facing all manner of strange creatures. Mythological adventure, with Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes and Gemma Arterton.(n)

programme.title: Avengers Assemble
programme.desc: A mystical artefact is stolen from a top-secret military base by Thor's brother Loki, who plans to use it to bring about an alien invasion. Spymaster Nick Fury brings together a team of superheroes, including Iron Man, Thor, Captain America and the Hulk, to defend Earth from the impending attack. Action adventure uniting the Marvel comic-book characters, starring Robert Downey Jr, Chris Evans, Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Scarlett Johansson, Tom Hiddleston, Jeremy Renner and Samuel L Jackson.(n)

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: Scientists are given a sneak preview of a safari park inhabited by genetically engineered dinosaurs created by an eccentric tycoon. However, it all goes wrong when a greedy employee sabotages the security systems, allowing the prehistoric beasts to roam free and hunt the visitors. Steven Spielberg's action adventure, starring Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum, Richard Attenborough and Samuel L Jackson.(n)

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension
programme.desc: A man moves into a new house along with his wife, daughter and younger brother, and finds an old camcorder and a box of videotapes. The siblings start watching the tapes, which turn out to be home movies shot by the property's previous owners, but by doing so, they unleash evil spirits into the world. Horror sequel, starring Chris J Murray and Brit Shaw.(n)

programme.title: Richard Pryor: Omit the Logic
programme.desc: A documentary on the stand-up comic and performer includes interviews with comedians, who describe his influence on them; and with family members, who discuss the difficulties in Pryor's life(n)

programme.title: Factory Girl
programme.desc: Workmanlike profile of socialite and 1960s counterculture icon Edie Sedgwick(n)

programme.title: Akeelah and the Bee
programme.desc: An underachieving young student from inner-city Los Angeles makes the grade as a national spelling-bee competitor(n)

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: A look at the 1976 Indiana Hoosiers basketball team, led by coach Bobby Knight, that posted a perfect 32-0 record on their way to winning the NCAA national championship(n)

programme.title: Prison Fighters: 5 Rounds to Freedom
programme.desc: A documentary examining a controversial practice in Thailand's criminal justice system whereby inmates can earn their freedom by winning a series of Muay Thai fights. The focus is on Noy Khaopan, a convicted murderer who fights for his release(n)

programme.title: Mighty Joe Young
programme.desc: Ron Underwood's remake of the 1949 cult classic stars Charlize Theron as Jill Young, who runs a game reserve in Africa that is home to Mighty Joe Young, a paranormally large gorilla. But both of them are in danger from big game hunter Strasser, who was also responsible for orphaning Jill and Joe. When Gregg O'Hara, a Californian zoologist, offers them both a haven in his reserve in America, Jill accepts but Strasser won't be thwarted and pursues Joe. And when Joe escapes and starts running amok in Hollywood, it seems the hunter's moment may have come... Since the film is produced by Disney, it is heart-warming throughout, but fans of special effects will enjoy the realisation of Joe, the work of expert Rick Baker, who also worked on King Kong (1976) and Gorillas in the Mist(n)

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: Incredible biopic of artist Margaret Keane, who lived in obscurity while her husband Walter shot to fame by claiming that he was responsible for her popular portraits of little children with saucer-like eyes(n)

programme.title: You Can Count on Me
programme.desc: Kenneth Lonerghan's Sundance-winning debut feature stars Laura Linney and Mark Ruffalo as orphaned siblings whose lives have taken different paths. She is a protective single mother living in a small town, he is troubled, living hand- to-mouth and trying to support his pregnant girlfriend. Arriving at his sister's to borrow money, old wounds are re-opened yet new bonds forged in this compassionate, moving drama(n)

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: Conspiracy thriller with a sci-fi twist. A Port Authority cop investigating the bombing of a ferry in New Orleans is given a machine by the FBI that allows him to spy on events four days in the past(n)

programme.title: Crash
programme.desc: (2004) Paul Haggis won two Oscars for his major feature debut as director and co-writer. Set in Los Angeles over two days, it is a picaresque, episodic film with a cast of disparate characters whose lives coincide for one reason or another, from racist cop John Ryan (Matt Dillon) who pulls over black TV director Cameron Thayer (Terrence Howard) and his wife Christine (Thandie Newton), to the simple hassles that Iranian Farad (Shaun Toub) encounters. Haggis shows a city where racism and its manifestations are easily encountered but where those at both the giving and receiving end are not simple ciphers but complex human beings whose intolerance is caused by both personal problems and issues within society at large. M,W,R,S,(n)

programme.title: Homeland
programme.desc: R Is for Romeo. Carrie and Quinn make a discovery; Keane makes a decision; Max finds trouble at work(n)

programme.title: Billions
programme.desc: Victory Lap. Axe assembles a war room in the Hamptons following a disastrous setback in Sandicot for Axe Capital. The fate of the town hangs in the balance while Axe seeks counsel on how to best recoup his losses. Meanwhile, Chuck capitalizes on a high-profile victory, but alienates Wendy in the process, causing the couple to change the status of their separation(n)

programme.title: Dark Net
programme.desc: My Mind. Season 2 begins with Harmony, the world's first artificially intelligent sex robot. Also: a woman who spends her days and nights uploading her mind to the algorithm; and a family whose lives were torn apart by over a decade of war, only to be saved by virtual reality(n)

programme.title: Penn & Teller: Bull!
programme.desc: Orgasms. Season 7 gets off to an exciting start as the guys explore the wonderful world of orgasms(n)

programme.title: Gigolos
programme.desc: The Boyfriend Experience. One of Steven's clients believes they are in a real relationship; Brace may become a father; Vin contemplates having his girlfriend move in with him(n)

programme.title: Dark Net
programme.desc: My Mind. Season 2 begins with Harmony, the world's first artificially intelligent sex robot. Also: a woman who spends her days and nights uploading her mind to the algorithm; and a family whose lives were torn apart by over a decade of war, only to be saved by virtual reality(n)

programme.title: The Circus: Inside the Biggest Story on Earth
programme.desc: How's He Doing?. Mark Halperin travels through the U.S. to find out what people outside the Beltway think of President Trump. He then heads to New Orleans to discuss his surprising findings with Mary Matalin(n)

programme.title: Billions

The fate of the town hangs in the balance while Axe seeks counsel on how to best recoup his losses. Meanwhile, Chuck capitalizes on a high-profile victory, but alienates Wendy in the process, causing the couple to change the status of their separation(n)

programme.title: Homeland
programme.desc: R Is for Romeo. Carrie and Quinn make a discovery; Keane makes a decision; Max finds trouble at work(n)

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An American businessman relocates his family to Southeast Asia, but their lives are put in grave danger when they get caught up in a violent political uprising. As they attempt to reach the US embassy, they are aided by a mysterious British tourist(n)

programme.title: The Ruins
programme.desc: Gruesome horror about a group of American twentysomethings whose Mexican holiday takes a grisly turn. When a German holidaymaker begs the travellers to help find his brother, who went missing exploring an ancient Mayan temple, the group agrees to offer their assistance. Unfortunately, the mercy mission turns into a desperate fight for survival as the tourists discover that something deeply unpleasant is waiting for them in the ruins. Adapted from the novel by Scott B Smith(n)

programme.title: Poltergeist II: The Other Side
programme.desc: Those ghastly ghosts return to battle once more with JoBeth Williams and Craig T. Nelson for the soul of a young clairvoyant(n)

programme.title: The Muppet Movie
programme.desc: Kermit and his new found friends trek across America to find success in Hollywood, but a frog-legs merchant is after Kermit(n)

programme.title: Premonition
programme.desc: Menna Yapo's fantasy drama stars Sandra Bullock as Linda Hanson, an ordinary housewife with two children whose life is thrown upside down when her husband Jim is killed in a car crash. After falling into a grief-stricken sleep, she awakens to find him in the kitchen drinking coffee. At first she believes she has had a nightmare but the next morning she awakes to his funeral preparations. While everyone else thinks she's going mad, Linda realises that she's caught in a time slip, with the days before and after Jim's death all mixed up. Now she must work out how to prevent his death without consequences for her or her daughters(n)

programme.title: Anesthesia
programme.desc: A professor is stabbed near his NYC apartment in this deeply humane ensemble drama. Elsewhere, his daughter-in-law battles cancer, a student of his has self-harm issues, a junkie is dragged to rehab and a suburban wife longs for the city(n)

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
programme.desc: An aquarium cleaner who is down on his luck turns to prostitution in an attempt to get out of debt(n)

programme.title: A Bronx Tale
programme.desc: The top dog in young Francis Capra's Bronx neighborhood is flashy "wiseguy" Chazz Palminteri. Palminteri befriends Capra, introducing the impressionable youngster to mob life. But though Capra idolizes Palminteri, he respects his honest father. It takes a tragedy for the 17-year-old boy to decide upon his true course in life(n)

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: The film is a mesmerizing and violent crime opus set in 1980 West Texas, where a man finds a fortune in drug loot, and tries to dodge a sheriff and a bounty hunter out to recover it(n)

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: Remake of the 1957 Western about a rancher escorting an outlaw to a rendezvous with the law, while the latter's henchmen try to head them off and free their leader(n)

programme.desc: Brian Wilson and the surviving members of The Beach Boys revisit the writing and recording of their landmark 1967 album "Pet Sounds" to celebrate the 50th anniversary of its release(n)

programme.desc: Comedy about the amateurish restoration of the 'Ecco Homo' fresco in 2012, which became a worldwide sensation and made a well-meaning Spanish pensioner an overnight celebrity(n)

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: Neil Burger's period mystery/ romance starring Edward Norton, Jessica Biel and Paul Giamatti. In 1900's Vienna there's only one show in town - and that's the one featuring mesmeric entertainer Eisenheim. His magical abilities are wowing the crowds, with an act that ranges from mere tricks to an apparent capacity to raise the dead. However, he has also long been in love with Duchess Sophie von Teschen, a fact which puts him in dangerous competition with the violent, scheming Crown Prince Leopold. And, after Eisenheim uses one of his performances as an opportunity to humiliate the Crown Prince, Leopold jumps at the opportunity to have the magician arrested by Inspector Uhl on grounds of necromancy. It's only then, during Eisenheim's interrogation, that we learn the full story of his life and the political plot that he's stumbled upon..(n)

programme.title: I Am Number Four
programme.desc: An extraterrestrial (Alex Pettyfer) masquerading as a typical teenager begins to understand the extraordinary nature of his powers after falling for a beautiful woman (Dianna Agron), and is forced to put his skills to the test in order to survive the intergalactic forces bent on finding and destroying him(n)

programme.title: Poltergeist II: The Other Side
programme.desc: Those ghastly ghosts return to battle once more with JoBeth Williams and Craig T. Nelson for the soul of a young clairvoyant(n)

Dan hunts down Oliver in L.A. and uses whatever means he can think of to manipulate Oliver into coming to the event. However, Dan's drive for Oliver's approval causes trouble in his relationships with his family and friends. The D Train screened at the 2015 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Tiny Furniture
programme.desc: A recent college graduate keeps stumbling as she steps out into the real world in this independent comedy drama. Aura (Lena Dunham) has just graduated from a university in the Midwest, receiving a degree in film theory that even she seems to realize is essentially worthless. With no real prospects she returns home to her mother, Siri (Laurie Simmons), a successful photographer living in New York City. Aura's 17-year-old sister, Nadine (Grace Dunham), is about to graduate from high school and is choosing which college to attend in the fall; Aura is ostensibly back home to help Siri and Nadine during a hectic time, but they don't appear to particularly need or want her assistance. Aura befriends Jed (Alex Karpovsky), a minor celebrity thanks to his surreal YouTube videos, who insists he's in New York to take meetings for an upcoming TV project; he soon invites himself into Aura's bedroom as a semi-permanent guest, though he clearly has no interest in any sort of romantic or sexual relationship. With little else to do, Aura takes a job at a nearby restaurant and becomes smitten with Keith (David Call), one of the cooks; while he seems attracted to her, he also has a girlfriend and it isn't until they're both stoned one night that he makes his move in a rather unusual setting. Tiny Furniture was written and directed by Lena Dunham, who also plays Aura; Laurie Simmons and Grace Dunham are her mother and sister in real life as well as in the film, which was mostly shot in Simmons' actual apartment. The film was named Best Narrative Feature at the 2010 South by Southwest Film Festival(n)

programme.title: America's Sweethearts

Facing 4,000 Mexican troops, 186 Texan soldiers and volunteers - including William Travis, Davy Crockett and Jim Bowie retreat within the walls of the Alamo, a Franciscan mission that was converted into a military fort. Once inside, the men prepare themselves for what will be a bloody battle to the death(n)

programme.title: The Straight Story
programme.desc: David Lynch's Oscar-nominated FilmFour-funded film, based on a true story, stars the late Richard Farnsworth as Alvin Straight. Alvin learns his brother is dying and wants to see him one more time. But he can't afford the air fare and he doesn't have a car. What he has is a tractor-mower that he decides to drive the 300 miles to Wisconsin. The film simply documents his painfully slow progress, the people he meets and the adventures he has but does so with loving care, slowly bringing out Alvin's character but showing along the way how he too brings out the best in those he meets. Unique, superlative filmmaking, stunningly shot by Freddie Francis(n)

programme.title: Big Significant Things

programme.title: Gringo: The Dangerous Life of John McAfee
programme.desc: The stranger-than-fiction saga of John McAfee, the computer antivirus software mogul who decamped to a heavily fortified jungle compound in Belize, where his libertine lifestyle was interrupted by allegations he had murdered his neighbor in 2012. His subsequent flight to Guatemala and later foray into United States politics is retold by Academy Award-nominated documentarian Nanette Burstein(n)

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: Ex-soldiers Michael Atwood (Chiwetel Ejiofor) and Russel Welch (Norman Reedus) lead an Atlanta criminal organization, which also includes Welch's troubled brother Gabe (Aaron Paul) and dirty cops Marcus Belmont (Anthony Mackie) and Jorge Rodriguez (Clifton Collins Jr.). The five heisters are contracted by the Russian-Israeli mob, headed by matriarch Irina Vlaslov (Kate Winslet), to pull off a dangerous job, and they decide to create the diversion of an "officer down" call as a cover for the robbery. Marcus' straight-arrow new partner Chris (Casey Affleck) is soon targeted as the mark for the shooting; meanwhile, Chris' uncle, Detective Jeffrey Allen (Woody Harrelson), works to foil the criminals. John Hillcoat directed this ensemble /action thriller written by Matt Cook(n)

programme.title: Tale of Tales
programme.desc: This fantasy epic adapts three fairy tales by 17th century Neapolitan writer Giambattista Basile, each one focusing on the royalty in neighboring kingdoms. In one, a king (John C. Reilly) goes off to cut the heart out of a sea monster, which could be the key to curing his wife (Salma Hayek) of infertility; in another, a dim-witted ruler (Toby Jones) neglects his daughter's search for a husband as he becomes obsessed with a flea that grows to enormous size; in the last tale, an oversexed monarch (Vincent Cassel) is bewitched by an elderly woman with a beautiful singing voice. Directed by Matteo Garrone (Gomorrah)(n)

programme.title: 88 Minutes
programme.desc: Al Pacino stars as a college professor and forensic psychologist for the FBI who learns that he is scheduled to die in 88 Minutes. Professor Jack Gramm's skills are put to the test, with is own life at stake, as he attempts to decipher which of three suspects plans to kill him--problem graduate student Mike Stemp, Gramm's former girlfriend or a serial murderer he helped put on death row. Gramm knows when, but he must still discover who and how he is to die in this edge-of-your-seat thriller(n)

programme.desc: A slacker named Bill lives in the shadow of his more-successful brother Robbie, a blind athlete and local celebrity. When the pair both fall for the same woman, Bill is forced to compete against his arrogant, narcissistic sibling for the first time(n)

programme.title: Never Back Down

Professor Jack Gramm's skills are put to the test, with is own life at stake, as he attempts to decipher which of three suspects plans to kill him--problem graduate student Mike Stemp, Gramm's former girlfriend or a serial murderer he helped put on death row. Gramm knows when, but he must still discover who and how he is to die in this edge-of-your-seat thriller(n)

programme.title: Outlander

programme.title: In Bruges
programme.desc: Having just carried out a particularly difficult hit in London, two hitmen seek shelter in Bruges, Belgium, only to find their views on life and death permanently altered by their interactions with the locals, the tourists, and a film crew. Colin Farrell, Brendan Gleeson, and Ralph Fiennes star in an action comedy from director Martin McDonagh(n)

programme.desc: This biopic follows Cleveland union rep Danny Greene, who earned notoriety in the mid-'70s for his willingness to defy the Italian mob. A former Mafia enforcer, Greene managed to survive numerous assassination attempts, and eventually he dealt a devastating blow to organized-crime syndicates across the U.S(n)

programme.title: The Raven
programme.desc: In this spellbinding mystery, horror author Edgar Allan Poe (John Cusack) joins forces with a young Baltimore detective to catch a psychotic serial killer who's obsessed with his stories(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Wasn't There
programme.desc: Shot in black-and-white and set in small-town California in the late '40s, this latest film from Joel Coen and brother Ethan Coen is a throwback to vintage film noir. Recalling Alfred Hitchcock's Shadow of a Doubt in its setting of Santa Rosa, CA, the story follows the dutiful, passive barber Ed Crane (Billy Bob Thornton), who narrates the tale. A soft-spoken fellow, Ed is greeted by Creighton Tolliver (played by Coen regular Jon Polito), a chatterbox customer who tells Ed that dry cleaning is the wave of the future. When Ed discovers his wife Doris (Frances McDormand) has been cheating on him with her department store boss Big Dave (James Gandolfini), Ed suddenly turns bitterly jealous. He hatches a blackmail scheme to extort money from Big Dave to fund a dry cleaning enterprise, which takes a wrong turn when Big Dave ends up dead. Meanwhile, Doris is charged with Dave's murder, having been found doctoring the books at her job, and Ed hires an impeccable new lawyer (Tony Shalhoub), who proves costly in the midst of his already unraveling life. The film also co-stars Michael Badalucco, Katherine Borowitz, and Scarlet Johanssen(n)

programme.title: Half of a Yellow Sun
programme.desc: Biyi Bandele's drama Half of a Yellow Sun stars Thandie Newton and Anika Noni Rose as twins born into a well-to-do Nigerian family. After completing their education overseas, each makes life choices that lead to a falling out between the once-close women. Eventually, the two sisters become embroiled in their home country's political unrest, which soon leads to civil war(n)

programme.title: The Missing

Meanwhile, in 2016, Sam and Gemma are pulling together and join Julien in a desperate race against time, as they track Alice and Sophie's abductor from Germany all the way to the mountains of Switzerland(n)

programme.title: The Ice Storm
programme.desc: Kevin Kline and Sigourney Weaver star in this acclaimed drama about discontent in 1970s suburban Connecticut. The story follows two dysfunctional families who each reach their breaking point when the adults participate in mate-swapping "key parties." Joan Allen, Jamey Sheridan, Christina Ricci, Elijah Wood, Adam Hann-Byrd, Tobey Maguire(n)

programme.title: Valkyrie

programme.title: Stone
programme.desc: A convicted arsonist schemes to get out of prison by convincing his debauched wife to seduce his retirement-ready parole officer in director John J. Curran's adaptation of a play by Angus MacLachlan (who also authored the screenplay). His career as a parole officer winding down after years of service, Jack Mabry (Robert De Niro) reluctantly accepts an assignment to reassess inmate Gerald "Stone" Creeson's (Edward Norton) case for an upcoming parole hearing. Convicted of setting a fire to make the murder of his grandparents look like an accidental death, Stone will do anything to get out from behind bars, and his wife, Lucetta (Milla Jovovich), is willing to do whatever it takes to help secure her husband's freedom -- including seducing Jack. Meanwhile, Jack's devoted wife, Madylyn (Frances Conroy), has suffered with the emotional weight of her husband's demanding job for far too long(n)

programme.title: Wolf Totem
programme.desc: A student from 1960's Beijing discovers a common ground between himself and the animals he lives beside in this period drama from director Jean-Jacques Annaud. After being sent to Mongolia to live with a group of herdsmen, Chen Zhen (Feng Shaofeng) develops an affection for a group of wolves who he comes to see as equals, and attempts to adopt and raise an endangered cub(n)

programme.title: She's the One
programme.desc: Friends star Jennifer Aniston plays a bored wife in this sparkling romantic comedy from talented young director Edward Burns. Burns also stars as Mickey Fitzpatrick, a free-wheeling New York taxi driver who thinks he has it all - until he meets a beautiful young student named Hope. Mickey's brother Francis, on the other hand, is a Wall Street trader happily married to his college sweetheart Renee - until he meets Heather , an old flame from Mickey's past! As the brothers' romantic entanglements set them on a collision course, they remember the lessons their father taught them about love and happiness - and wonder whether he might have been wrong..(n)

programme.title: Only the Strong Survive
programme.desc: Documentary film makers DA Pennebaker and Chris Hegedus and journalist Robert Friedman had a mission: to catch up with the great soul singers of the 1960s and 1970s. The film makers put together a concert of the great survivors, reuniting many of the stars under the STAX record label. Featured artists include William Bell, Jerry Butler, The Chi-Lites, Isaac Hayes, Sam Moore, Ann Peebles, Wilson Pickett, Rufus Thomas and Mary Wilson(n)

programme.title: One More Time
programme.desc: In this touching drama, a musician reeling from personal and professional disappointments moves into the Hamptons home of her father, a Sinatra-esque crooner still hoping to make a career comeback. In time, father and daughter bond while seeking success in the music industry(n)

programme.title: The Salt of the Earth
programme.desc: Profiling Brazilian photojournalist Sebastião Salgado, whose black-and-white portraits often focused on third-world countries and impoverished communities. This documentary was co-directed by Wim Wenders and Juliano Ribeiro Salgado, the director's son(n)

programme.title: Jimmy's Hall
programme.desc: The story of the only Irishman ever deported from Ireland, Jimmy Gralton, who was arrested and ousted during the country's Red Scare of the 1930s(n)

programme.title: The Dresser
programme.desc: During World War II, the backstage hand of a touring Shakespearean theatre company struggles to support the brilliant but tyrannical head of the company(n)

programme.title: Hotel Rwanda
programme.desc: Director: Terry George. The true-life story of Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager who housed over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda(n)

programme.title: The Sound and the Fury
programme.desc: James Franco directs this adaptation of William Faulkner's The Sound and the Fury, the writer's tale of the Compson family, a once wealthy Southern clan devolving into obscurity. Tim Blake Nelson portrays the patriarch, a boozy lawyer who oversees the lives of his children with cynical monologues delivered through an alcoholic haze. Quentin, the oldest child, goes to Harvard, but he's very close with Caddy, the only daughter in the family who has a child out of wedlock. Second son Jason attempts to rule the family with an iron fist, but he's full of resentment towards Caddy's bastard child. All of them attempt to care for the developmentally disabled Benjy (Franco). Franco employs a fractured approach to the narrative in an attempt to capture Faulkner's distinctive prose style. The Sound and the Fury screened at the 2014 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: One More Time
programme.desc: In this touching drama, a musician reeling from personal and professional disappointments moves into the Hamptons home of her father, a Sinatra-esque crooner still hoping to make a career comeback. In time, father and daughter bond while seeking success in the music industry(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: In an alternate 19th century English countryside, a fast-spreading zombie plague is threatening to bring the world to an end. Elizabeth Bennet who is trained in martial arts teams up with Mr. Darcy to battle the zombie apocalypse, and discover their love for one another(n)

programme.title: Hedwig and the Angry Inch
programme.desc: John Cameron Mitchell gives a stunning performance in this adaptation of his off-Broadway hit about a transsexual rocker. A botched operation leaves Hedwig (Mitchell) deformed and embittered. To add insult to injury, his former lover steals his songs and becomes an international star. Michael Pitt, Miriam Shor, Stephen Trask, Theodore Liscinski(n)

programme.title: The Ringer
programme.desc: Madcap physical comedy ensues when an able-bodied man pretends to be disabled in order to sweep the board at the Special Olympics and clean up at the bookies(n)

programme.title: Imagine Me & You
programme.desc: As a bride prepares for her wedding she begins to question her sexuality when she comes into contact with a striking woman. With her infatuation growing, the bride's family and friends become increasingly concerned(n)

programme.title: Crimes of the Heart
programme.desc: Diane Keaton, Jessica Lange, and Sissy Spacek shine in Beth Henley's adaptation of her Pulitzer comedy about eccentric Southern sisters. Doc: Sam Shepard. Chick: Tess Harper (Oscar nominee). Lloyd: David Carpenter. Granddaddy: Hurd Hatfield. Zackery: Beeson Carroll. Lucille: Jean Willard. Watson: Tom Mason. Directed by Bruce Beresford(n)

programme.title: Alpha and Omega
programme.desc: Kate and Humphrey are two mismatched wolves who embark on a cross-country quest to get back home and restore peace in their pack after being relocated thousands of miles away by well-meaning park rangers. Humphrey likes to frolic with friends and play video games with squirrels while disciplined Kate likes to call the shots and hunt caribou. Normally, an omega wolf like Humphrey would never stand a chance with an alpha wolf like Kate, but now they must work together to get back to their natural habitat. Even though a growing mutual appreciation of their talents and then a deeper love threatens to disastrously complicate everything if they make it home..(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Peter La Fleur owns Average Joe's Gym, a scruffy establishment with a loyal clientele, while across the street Globo Gym, owned by White Goodman, is all glass and chrome and full of toned muscle. When La Fleur learns that he must pay the bank $50,000 in 30 days, Goodman is overjoyed: he can acquire his rival's building, knock it down and have the car park his gym's always needed. But La Fleur decides to set up a money-earning dodgeball tournament (a sport that consists of not being hit by balls hurled by the opposing team). And, of course, La Fleur's team of misfits end up in a face-off against Goodman's tough pros in the final. Rawson Marshall Thurber's debut feature is a mix of verbal and physical humour, and, if the outcome is never in doubt, both Vaughn and Stiller throw themselves into the venture with enjoyable gusto(n)

programme.title: Dan in Real Life
programme.desc: Advice columnist Dan Burns struggles with his own three kids, but life gets even more complicated when he falls for his brother's new love(n)

programme.title: Chasing Amy
programme.desc: Best friends Holden McNeil and Banky Edwards are enjoying success as the creators of the cult comic book 'Bluntman and Chronic.' When they meet fellow comic book artist Alyssa Jones, Holden's desire for the beautiful charmer is immediate. Alyssa, however, has set her romantic sights elsewhere but decides, nevertheless, to pursue a friendship with Holden(n)

Anna Faris ("Scary Movie") stars in this hilarious farce. Colin Hanks, Emma Stone, Kat Dennings, Dana Goodman, Beverly D'Angelo. Directed by Fred Wolf(n)

programme.title: Get a Job
programme.desc: Will (Miles Teller) and Jillian (Anna Kendrick) are a young couple who recently graduated from college and are trying to hack it in the real world. As the pair grapple with the pangs of adulthood, Will ends up back at square one on the job hunt when he learns that his writing internship will no longer turn into a full-time gig, while Jillian is laid off from her first post-grad position. Dylan Kidd directed this comedy about millennial malaise, with Bryan Cranston, Alison Brie, and Christopher Mintz-Plasse co-starring(n)

A brilliant young mathematician is recruited by his professor to join a crack team of students whose system of card-counting is enabling them to win millions from the casinos of Las Vegas. How long can their winning streak last, however, once a suspicious head of casino security makes it his mission to bring an end to their forbidden activities?(n)

programme.title: Swashbuckler
programme.desc: Blend of piracy and tongue-in-cheek humor set in 18th-century Jamaica. Robert Shaw, James Earl Jones, Genevieve Bujold, Peter Boyle, Beau Bridges. Cudjo: Geoffrey Holder. Polonski: Avery Schreiber. Moonbeam: Tom Clancy. Alice: Dorothy Tristan. Woman of Dark Visage: Anjelica Huston. James Goldstone directed(n)

programme.title: 12 Rounds 3: Lockdown
programme.desc: A police officer (Dean Ambrose) returning to the force after the death of his close friend and teammate, and seeks justice against several implicated parties, in this revenge-filled action drama. After learning that several crooked cops were behind the shooting, and that some of those officers are now attempting to frame him murder, the returning crime fighter must try to stop the culprits who will do anything to silence him(n)

programme.title: Deliver Us From Eva
programme.desc: Three men discover that meddling in their sister-in-law's love life only makes their own lives more complicated in this romantic comedy. Eva Dandridge (Gabrielle Union) developed a sense of responsibility early on in life, when after the death of her parents she was left to care for her three younger sisters, Kareenah (Essence Atkins), Bethany (Robinne Lee), and Jacqui (Meagan Good). All four of the Dandridge sisters have grown up to be attractive, intelligent, and successful; Kareenah is happily married to Tim (Mel Jackson), while Bethany is engaged to Michael (Duane Martin), and Jacqui is going steady with Darrell (Dartanyan Edmonds). However, Eva still watches over her siblings like a hawk, and while her sisters love Eva dearly, Tim, Michael, and Darrell wish their sister-in-law would stay out of their business. The guys decide that if Eva had a boyfriend, she might be less interested in running other people's lives, and they turn to Ray (LL Cool J), a notorious ladies' man, for help. Ray is short on cash, so the guys make him a deal -- they'll give him 5,000 dollars to romance Eva, sweep her off her feet, and then dump her a few weeks later. Ray agrees, and while getting past her no-nonsense demeanor takes some doing, before long she's head over heels for him. However, Ray unexpectedly finds himself falling in love with Eva, and Eva, when offered a job in another town, decides to stay on to be with Ray. Even worse, the other Dandridge sisters are so impressed with the romantic Ray that they start demanding a bit more TLC from their own men(n)

programme.title: Men of Honor
programme.desc: The film is inspired by the true story of Carl Brashear, first African American master diver in US Navy, and the man who trained him(n)

programme.title: New Jersey Drive
programme.desc: Teen friends from Jersey find a hobby, and later an enterprise, in boosting cars. But a crooked cop and a vengeful youth from their neighborhood threaten to end their fun. And their lives(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: A female-led reboot of the classic franchise(n)

programme.title: Deliver Us From Eva
programme.desc: Three men discover that meddling in their sister-in-law's love life only makes their own lives more complicated in this romantic comedy. Eva Dandridge (Gabrielle Union) developed a sense of responsibility early on in life, when after the death of her parents she was left to care for her three younger sisters, Kareenah (Essence Atkins), Bethany (Robinne Lee), and Jacqui (Meagan Good). All four of the Dandridge sisters have grown up to be attractive, intelligent, and successful; Kareenah is happily married to Tim (Mel Jackson), while Bethany is engaged to Michael (Duane Martin), and Jacqui is going steady with Darrell (Dartanyan Edmonds). However, Eva still watches over her siblings like a hawk, and while her sisters love Eva dearly, Tim, Michael, and Darrell wish their sister-in-law would stay out of their business. The guys decide that if Eva had a boyfriend, she might be less interested in running other people's lives, and they turn to Ray (LL Cool J), a notorious ladies' man, for help. Ray is short on cash, so the guys make him a deal -- they'll give him 5,000 dollars to romance Eva, sweep her off her feet, and then dump her a few weeks later. Ray agrees, and while getting past her no-nonsense demeanor takes some doing, before long she's head over heels for him. However, Ray unexpectedly finds himself falling in love with Eva, and Eva, when offered a job in another town, decides to stay on to be with Ray. Even worse, the other Dandridge sisters are so impressed with the romantic Ray that they start demanding a bit more TLC from their own men(n)

programme.title: The Glass Shield
programme.desc: J.J. is a rookie state trooper in the Sheriff's Department and the first black officer at that station. Racial tensions run high in the department as some of J.J.'s fellow officers resent his presence. His only real friend is the other new trooper, the first female officer to work there, who also suffers similar discrimination in the otherwise all-white-male work environment. When J.J. becomes increasingly aware of police corruption during the murder trial of Teddy Woods, who he helped to arrest, he faces difficult decisions and puts himself into grave personal danger in the service of justice(n)

programme.title: The Bleeding
programme.desc: Left for dead by a gang of ruthless vampires who forced him to witness the slaughter of his own family, ex-Army Ranger Shawn Black (Michael Matthias) vows to put every last one of the vicious bloodsuckers back in the ground where they belong. Later, as Shawn tracks down the hive's magnetic leader Cain (Vinnie Jones) and his loyal servant Vanya (Kat Von D), he realizes this is one job he can't handle on his own. Fortunately for Shawn, Reverend Ray (Michael Madsen) is there to help him realize his true potential as a "slayer", one of the few remaining humans with the power to defeat the living dead. DMX and Armand Assante co-star(n)

programme.desc: Psychological chiller about a quiet young drifter whose arrival in a coastal town triggers a wave of bizarre and frightening events. Vann Siegert, carrying nothing more than a flask of Southern Comfort, breezes into town and is warmly welcomed by an older couple, Doug and Jane. They offer him their missing daughter's bedroom and find him employment at the local post office, where he attracts the affections of Ferrin. But the disappearance of a local high school football star is just the beginning of a series of strange events that occur not long after Vann's arrival..(n)

programme.title: The Land Before Time III: The Time of Great Giving
programme.desc: In this third installment of the animated saga of a young brontosaurus and his pals, trouble has come to the Great Valley in the form of a meteorite. It fell just beyond the valley and now blocks the main water supply. As the land dries and thirst increases, the different species of dinosaurs who once coexisted peacefully become fractious. Suddenly Littlefoot and his friends are no longer allowed to play together. As bigotry and bickering increase, Littlefoot's gang decides that it's up to them to save the day. Since they went outside the valley in the last sequel, they know where water can be found, and though the Great Beyond is populated by tyrannosauruses and other carnivores, the youngsters know that they and their parents must take that risk in order to survive(n)

programme.desc: George Clooney is a 24/7 reporter exposing city hall corruption - and left holding his daughter when his wife walks out. And when they learn of each other's problems, taking turn to care for the kids also leads to love in Michael Hoffman's outstanding romantic comedy(n)

programme.title: Tuck Everlasting
programme.desc: If you could choose to live forever, would you? That's the thought-provoking question posed in Natalie Babbitt's famous novel, and this film based on it. The story centres round Winnie, a girl who lives in a very strict household where there's very little love or fun to be had. Then she discovers a mysterious family living in the grounds of the house, and falls in love with one of them. Jesse returns her affection, but then divulges his family's secret: they are immortals - people who will live forever since they drank from a magical spring. If Winnie wants to be with Jesse she must become immortal too. But there are lots of disadvantages - what will she choose? Teenage romance with a message in this touching family drama(n)

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: The Opposite. Although it was not the last episode shot for the show's fifth season -- that would be "The Hamptons," which aired second to last -- it makes sense that "The Opposite" aired last, as several turns of events set the stage for the sixth season. It all starts with George deciding to do the opposite of everything he would normally do. Once he puts the plan into action, the perennial loser suddenly sees things going well for himself. He gets a girlfriend, a job with the Yankees, and finally moves out of his parents house. Meanwhile, Jerry realizes that his luck is "even Steven," Kramer appears on Live! With Regis and Kathy Lee to promote his coffee-table book about coffee tables, and Elaine suddenly can't win, leading her to believe that she has switched places with George. Originally airing May 19, 1994, the fifth-season closer guest starred 3rd Rock From the Sun's French Stewart and featured the first appearance of the faceless George Steinbrenner, voiced by co-creator Larry David(n)

Bruce Mahler, who co-starred with Larry David and Michael Richards on ABC's failed late-night show Fridays, guest stars as Rabbi Glickman. programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Where's the Boss. Al (Ed O'Neill) is wrong when he jumps to the conclusion that his never-seen boss Gary (Geoffrey Scott) has died, but he is right on the money when he concludes that Gary has gone out of his way to avoid him. His gorge rising, Al demands that his boss acknowledge his existence--or he'll quit. The role of Ed is played by veteran character actor Lewis Arquette, the father of actresses Rosanna Arquette and Patricia Arquette(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Johnny Be Gone. "You can watch reruns or you can watch Fox" blared the original ads for this, the final episode of Married. . .With Children's first season (ironically, you'd be watching reruns on Fox one week later). The plot is set in motion when Al and Peg learn that their favorite hamburger joint, Johnny B. Goods, is soon to close its doors for good. As the Bundy try to attend the restaurant's last night, they are constantly delayed by the misadventures of their children--and their anxiety spills over to their next-door neighbors Steve (David Garrison) and Marcy (Amanda Bearse), who are planning to throw a party for some VIPs. (This is one of the series' two episodes to be taped in a single, long, continuous "scene")(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Poppy's by the Tree. Part 1 of 2. The Bundys holiday in Dumpwater, Florida where an axe murderer who hates tourists visits every five years(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Poppy's by the Tree. In the conclusion of Married. . .With Children's two-part Season Two opener (originally telecast in a single one-hour slot), the Bundy family's "vacation from Hell" in Dumpwater Florida gets worse thanks to a pesky axe murderer. Inevitably, the killer kidnaps Peg (Katey Sagal), who pleads for her life by promising to do her captor's housework (How desperate can you get?) Meanwhile, the rest of the family formulates a rescue plan. . .sort of(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.sub-title: If I Were a Rich Man
programme.desc: If I Were a Rich Man. Panic grips the bank where Steve (David Garrison) works when the vault comes up a million dollars short. The Bundy family assumes that their patriarch Al (Ed O'Neill) has snatched the dough during a nocturnal visit to the vault (where he played cards with Steve)--and accordingly, Peg (Katey Sagal) and the kids treat Al like a hero. Basking in all this attention, Al begins to wish that he really was a thief. . .but if that were the case, Season Two of Married. . .With Children would have been over and done with after only three episodes(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Buck Can Do It. The Bundys' neighbors are incensed by the "stupid, ugly puppies" that have popped up over the past several months. The blame for this phenomenon is placed on the Bundy's dog Buck, aka "The Carnal Tresspasser." Amidst demands that he neuter the dog, Al Bundy (Ed O'Neill) has a surreal dream in which Buck assumes human form. Christina Applegate (Kelly Bundy) does not appear in this episode, the first to be taped for the series' second season (though not the first to be shown)(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Girls Just Wanna Have Fun. In the first episode of a two-part story (originally telecast in a single hour-long slot), Marcy (Amanda Bearse) leaves home in a huff after a fight with husband Steve (David Garrison). Hoping to cheer Marcy up, freewheeling Peg (Katey Sagal) takes her uptight neighbor to Troy's, a male strip club. Whilst dancing the night away with a stripper named Zorro (Billy Hufsey), Marcy drops a generous tip into Zorro's pants--and loses her wedding ring in the process!(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Girls Just Wanna Have Fun. In the conclusion of a two-part story (originally telecast as a single hour-long entry), Marcy (Amanda Bearse) despairs over the loss of her wedding ring, which she lost while tipping a male stripper named Zorro (Billy Hufsey) at Troy's strip club. Meanwhile, Zorro shows up at the doorstep of Marcy's neighbor Al (Ed O'Neill) to return the ring. As a result, Al and Marcy's husband Steve (David Garrison) conspire to lay an enormous guilt trip on both their wives--after all, it was Al's spouse Peg (Katey Sagal) who apparently led Marcy astray(n)

John Ford's Western, starring John Wayne, Natalie Wood, Jeffrey Hunter and Vera Miles.(n)

Western, with John Ireland and Virginia Mayo.(n)

programme.desc: A rancher gets mixed up in an ongoing conflict between those like him, who wish to have their land fenced off, and cattlemen who want all the grasslands to be left open. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, Jason Sudeikis, Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston and Colin Farrell.(n)

A centurion who survives the massacre takes charge of the survivors and leads them on a daring mission to rescue their captured general and make it back to their own territory alive. Neil Marshall's action thriller, with Michael Fassbender, Dominic West and Olga Kurylenko.(n)

programme.desc: The drovers come across a teenage brother and sister and their dying mother alone on the trail, who are trying to move East and avoid their father, who has been released from jail.(n)

programme.title: A Big Hand for the Little Lady
programme.desc: A poker player plans to renounce his gambling ways and become a farmer to support his family. When he learns of a high-stakes game he cannot resist, but ends up losing everything and suffering a heart attack. His wife steps into the breach to finish the game and try to win back her savings - but she has never played poker before. Western, starring Henry Fonda, Joanne Woodward and Jason Robards.(n)

programme.desc: Sea captain Wolf Larsen, whose cultured interests belie his tyrannical nature, keeps his ship's crew and passengers on a tight leash. However, when a monumental storm breaks, the rest of the vessel's occupants spot their chance for mutiny. Sea-faring adventure, starring Barry Sullivan.(n)

programme.title: Julius Caesar
programme.desc: An honourable Roman is drawn into a conspiracy of senators, who intend to murder a triumphant war leader before he can appoint himself king. However, when an ally of their victim turns the people against them, a war erupts that will determine the fate of the empire. Drama adapted from Shakespeare's play, starring Charlton Heston, Jason Robards and John Gielgud.(n)

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October
programme.desc: A Soviet submarine commander creates an international crisis by piloting his experimental nuclear vessel, which is invisible to sonar, toward the American coast. The US and Russian navies think he is planning to attack and set out to destroy the submarine, but a CIA analyst suspects he intends to defect to the West. Cold War thriller, based on Tom Clancy's novel, starring Sean Connery, Alec Baldwin and James Earl Jones.(n)

programme.title: The Exorcist: The Version You've Never Seen
programme.desc: A girl is possessed by a formidable demonic entity that resists all efforts at freeing her from its grasp. In desperation, the child's mother appeals for help from a local priest and a veteran exorcist, but succeeding in this nightmarish contest of wills threatens the lives of both men. Revised version of William Friedkin's horror, starring Linda Blair, Jason Miller, Ellen Burstyn, Max von Sydow and Lee J Cobb.(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Oh My Goddess!. In the first half of Charmed's fifth-season finale (originally telecast as a single two-hour episode), the mythical Titans are released from their eternal prison, whereupon they wipe out all the Whitelighter Elders -- leaving only Leo (Brian Krause) in charge. While Leo is thus occupied, a mysterious Whitelighter from the future is assigned as guardian angel for the Charmed Ones. Somehow, this results in the three girls being transformed into Greek goddesses: Piper (Holly Marie Combs) is the Goddess of Earth, Phoebe (Alyssa Milano) is the Goddess of Love, and Paige (Rose McGowan) is the Goddess of War!(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Oh My Goddess!.
